descriptionPlain:
Match Media Group is seeking a full-time Ad Operations Analyst with a strong interest in internet advertising operations.

Perform all aspects of traffic management for direct campaigns, including accurate and timely set up, testing, management and optimization of online display ad and video ad campaigns in Google Ad Manager.
description:
Match Media Group is seeking a full-time Ad Operations Analyst with a strong interest in internet advertising operations.

Perform all aspects of traffic management for direct campaigns, including accurate and timely set up, testing, management and optimization of online display ad and video ad campaigns in Google Ad Manager.

lists.content:
• Perform QA for all campaigns prior to going live
  • Provide guidance to internal stakeholders regarding inventory management and best practices for ad performance
  • Provide technical support for sales and engineering teams to help troubleshoot problem creative
  • Develop optimization strategies on a campaign-by-campaign basis to maximize both delivery and advertiser performance
  • Ensure smooth delivery of campaigns by maintaining and distributing pacing reports
  • Work with product teams to implement and test new ad products/ad experiences
  • Provide excellent customer service to internal stakeholders and external partners
  • Establish, implement and maintain digital ad operations best practices
  • Excellent communication and organizational skills
  • Ability to meet deadlines and handle multiple tasks
  • Sharp problem-solving and troubleshooting skills
  • Excellent quantitative and analytical skills
  • Self-starter with the ability to work in a fast paced, startup environment
  • Monitor competitive landscape and stay educated on the new developments in digital ad operations

• Minimum BA/BS degree from an accredited college or university
  • 2-4 years of experience in digital ad operations
  • High level of proficiency with Google Ad Manager, Ad Exchange, and other digital advertising core technology
  • Familiar with tag vendors including DCM, DV, MOAT, Sizmek, etc
  • Experience with web troubleshooting tools such as Firebug, Charles, Chrome/Safari Inspector or Web Developer Tools
  • Understanding of HTML, CSS, Flash or JavaScript

descriptionPlain:
Founded in Vancouver, Canada in 2003, Plenty of Fish is one of the early pioneers in the online dating industry, with one of the largest and most diverse communities of singles. We're one of the top revenue-driving brands in the Match Group (comprised of Tinder, OkCupid, Hinge and Match.com).

We love what we do, and have the ability to profoundly impact millions of people's lives every single day! Named one of BC’s Top Employers, Plenty of Fish is a great place to build friendships, grow your career and collaborate with top talent.

We work hybrid at Plenty of Fish - IRL in our downtown Vancouver office Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and work remotely the remainder of the week!

We are looking for an Android Engineer to support our live-streaming squad at Plenty Of Fish. Here, you will have the opportunity to build and maintain features that are used by millions of users daily. Live Streaming is one of our top product offerings with high visibility across the organization.  We have a team of passionate and focused engineers who work in a fast-paced and collaborative environment and are looking for someone to contribute to this!

We work hybrid at Plenty of Fish - IRL in our downtown Vancouver office Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and work remotely the remainder of the week!

We are looking for an Android Engineer to support our live-streaming squad at Plenty Of Fish. Here, you will have the opportunity to build and maintain features that are used by millions of users daily. Live Streaming is one of our top product offerings with high visibility across the organization.  We have a team of passionate and focused engineers who work in a fast-paced and collaborative environment and are looking for someone to contribute to this!

lists.content:
• Work with a passionate team of engineers to create apps that encourage social interactions and help form real relationships
  • Architect, build and iterate on major components and new product features for Plenty of Fish apps
  • Work in a fast-paced highly collaborative cross-functional environment and share your expertise to help solve complex problems at a large scale
  • Proactively identify areas for improvement, diagnose issues and collaborate with other team members to resolve them
  • Partner closely with design and product teams to continuously improve our applications
  • Work in a data-driven environment implementing AB tests and working with analytical application data
  • Actively contribute to the codebases powering one of the top social applications on Google PlayWork with Modern Android Architecture: Jetpack Compose, Coroutines, Flow

lists.text: You'll be a match for this role if you have..
lists.content:
• 4+ years of development experience on Android with In-depth experience in building and shipping complex Android applications using Kotlin & Java
  • Experience building and shipping mobile applications using React Native
  • A strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles, design patterns, multithreading, and networking
  • Knowledge of debugging, profiling and optimizing Android Apps for performance
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable and testable code whilst maintaining high standards of code quality
  • Experience in building apps consuming REST APIs
  • The ability to multitask and manage competing priorities
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills

descriptionPlain:
Our Mission

As humans, there are few things more exciting than meeting someone new. At Tinder, we’re inspired by the challenge of keeping the magic of human connection alive. With tens of millions of users, hundreds of millions of downloads, 2+ billion swipes per day, 20+ million matches per day, and a presence in 190+ countries, our reach is expansive—and rapidly growing.
 
We work together to solve complex problems. Behind the simplicity of every match, we think deeply about human relationships, behavioral science, network economics, AI and ML, online and real-world safety, cultural nuances, loneliness, love, sex, and more.

The Team

There are internships and then there's the Tindership program. Forget boring busywork—spend your summer as part of our team, making a real impact on our business. Tinder interns gain a meaningful experience connecting with their mentor and managers, participating in large-scale projects, and collaborating with other interns in our flagship Tindership hackathon. You’ll join an inclusive workplace and gain real-world experiences and exposure to Tinder's culture.

About the Role 

As an Android intern at Tinder, you will partner directly with senior members of the mobile team and be empowered to contribute solutions to the Tinder codebase. We are deeply invested in challenging norms, constantly improving architecture design, exploring emergent tech and ideas, and leveraging new technologies in interesting ways to deliver an app that is widely known the world over. 

Where you’ll work

This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. The position will be located in Los Angeles, CA.

There are internships and then there's the Tindership program. Forget boring busywork—spend your summer as part of our team, making a real impact on our business. Tinder interns gain a meaningful experience connecting with their mentor and managers, participating in large-scale projects, and collaborating with other interns in our flagship Tindership hackathon. You’ll join an inclusive workplace and gain real-world experiences and exposure to Tinder's culture.

About the Role

As an Android intern at Tinder, you will partner directly with senior members of the mobile team and be empowered to contribute solutions to the Tinder codebase. We are deeply invested in challenging norms, constantly improving architecture design, exploring emergent tech and ideas, and leveraging new technologies in interesting ways to deliver an app that is widely known the world over.

Where you’ll work

This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. The position will be located in Los Angeles, CA.

lists.content:
• Collaborate on the development, implementation and  functionality of Tinder's newest features and platform architecture
  • Build robust, lasting, and scalable products that serve millions of users
  • Work on systems that handle billions of data events a day
  • Leverage large scale multi-channel communications to keep users well-informed (push notifications, emails, in-app messaging, and more)
  • Write unit and integration tests 
  • Participate in the annual Tindership Hackathon, presenting with your team to the entire Tinder team and panel of executives.

• Aspiring Android developer who’s excited to work on large scale challenges with cutting-edge technology
  • Proficiency in coding with Kotlin or Java 
  • Foundational knowledge of basic Computer Science principles: data structures and algorithms.
  • Currently pursuing a BS/BA, MS, or PhD in Computer Science or a related field (Graduation date of December 2024 onward)

• Prior Internship or work experience on a native mobile application
  • Completed mobile project experience (i.e. hack-a-thons, personal projects, GitHub, Open Source, volunteer coding experience etc.
  • Familiarity with architecture frameworks such as  MVC, MVVM, Viper etc
  • Aware of native app development tools/concepts like RxJava, Coroutines, Retrofit, Dagger, Dependency injection etc. is not required but a bonus

lists.text: As part of our team, you'll enjoy:
lists.content:
• The liveliness of a startup with the impact of a global business
  • Collaborating with a team of creative, fun and driven colleagues 
  • Working with an extraordinary team of smart, creative, fun, and highly motivated people
  • Competitive hourly pay and flexible working schedule
  • Comprehensive health coverage, 401(k) 
  • Access to mental health resources
  • Virtual yoga and fitness classes, and many other fun activities
  • Virtual celebrations, parties, socials, and more
  • A robust Learning + Development offering including our MentorMatch program, access to a library of 6,000+ online learning courses through Udemy
  • Fully customized computer equipment to fit your needs
  • The opportunity to join 8+ active Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)

descriptionPlain:
[Hyper-X]

“우리는 최신 기술을 활용한 글로벌 제품을 만듭니다.”

Hyper-X 팀의 미션은, 현 시대의 최신 기술들을 활용하여 세상에 임팩트를 줄 수 있는 프로덕트를 만들고, 글로벌 시장에 출시하여 더 많은 사용자들과 새로운 경험을 나누는 것입니다. 창업한 그 순간부터 늘 창조적인 길을 개척해 온 하이퍼커넥트의 DNA와 혁신적인 기술, 그리고 매치그룹의 탄탄한 지원을 바탕으로 글로벌을 향한 도전을 계속합니다.

팀에 합류하시면,
- 상상력과 열정을 발휘할 수 있는 팀과 함께 Zero to One을 만들어갈 수 있습니다.
- 글로벌 시장에서 성공 경험을 이끈 하이퍼커넥트 멤버들과 Match Group의 글로벌 팀과 협업할 수 있습니다.
- 모든 멤버가 자신의 전문 분야를 뛰어넘어 자유롭게 의견을 나누고 협력하는 문화를 경험할 수 있습니다.

lists.content:
• Feature
    • - Azar, Hakuna 에서 축적된 노하우의 도움을 받아, 신규서비스를 구현하고 운영합니다
    - 디자인, API, QA 등 다른 직무의 동료들과 협업하며 목표 달성을 위한 최적의 방안을 찾아 구현합니다.
    - 자신이 개발한 기능에 대해서 담당을 하는 동시에 다른 팀원들에게 관련 코드를 전파하여, 기능별로 weak code ownership 에서 collective code ownership 으로 넘어갈 수 있도록 합니다.

  • Code review
    • - 자신이 작성한 코드가 아니어도 서로 이해하고 필요한 경우 누구든 수정할 수 있도록, 상시적인 Pull request 기반의 코드리뷰를 합니다.

  • Troubleshooting
    • - 배포된 애플리케이션이 우리가 기대한 쾌적한 경험을 만들고 있는지를 모니터링하며, 문제가 있다면 최대한 빠르게 해결합니다.
    - Crash를 줄이고 Responsiveness를 최대한 높이기 위해 상시적인 작업을 하고 있으며, 그 외에도 다양한 네트웍/연결 지표등을 실시간으로 모니터링하며 서비스의 동작이 예측 가능한 품질을 유지하도록 합니다.

  • Architectural improvement
    • - 새로운 기술이나 패러다임을 도입하여 장기적으로 생산성을 높일 수 있다면 적극적으로 고려합니다.
    - 일관성 있고 예측 가능한 구조, 더 유연하고 강력한 도구들을 사용하여 전체 코드의 가독성을 높이고 의도치 않은 사이드 이펙트를 줄입니다.

• Android 개발 경력 4년 이상 보유하신 분
  • Android 플랫폼에 대한 이해 및 상용 서비스 개발 경험을 보유하신 분
  • Java, Kotlin과 JVM 개발환경에 익숙하신 분
  • CS 기본 지식들(알고리즘, 자료구조, 메모리 모델, 운영체제 등)에 대한 이해를 보유하신 분
  • RxJava, Coroutine 등 비동기 코드의 기본적인 사용에 이해가 있으신 분
  • Thread safe한 코드 작성에 익숙하신 분
  • 영어로 된 기술 문서 독해가 가능하신 분
  • Git에 익숙하신 분

• Repository pattern, MVVM, clean architecture, 반응형 프로그래밍에 대한 이해를 보유하신 분
  • Android databinding 사용 경험을 보유하신 분
  • Unit 테스트 작성과 mocking에 대한 경험이 많거나, 흥미가 많으신 분
  • 코드 보안에 관심 많으신 분
  • 내부 세미나 또는 블로깅 등의 방법으로 본인의 지식을 공유하는 것을 즐기시는 분

• 정의되지 않은 과제를 정의하고 스스로 해결책을 찾아 해결합니다.
  • 팀 단위 프로젝트를 성공적으로 리딩할 수 있으며, 팀간 협업을 이끌고 다른 기능의 직군 파트너와 협업합니다.
  • 팀 안팎으로 커뮤니케이션하며 내 메시지를 청자에 맞추어 적절한 수준에서 명확하고 간결하게 제시합니다.
  • 팀 간의 협업 과정을 조정하고 결과물을 만들 수 있도록 지원합니다.

• 고용 형태: 정규직
  • 채용 절차: 서류전형 > 1차 면접 > 2차 면접 > 3차면접(해당 시) > 최종 합격
  • 근무 시간: 근무시간을 자율적으로 선택하는DIY(Do It Yourself) 근무제
  • 지원 서류: 자유 양식의 상세 경력기반 국문 또는 영문이력서(PDF)

• 하이퍼커넥트는 증명사진, 주민등록번호, 가족관계, 혼인여부 등 채용과 관계없는 개인정보를 요구하지 않습니다.
  • 수습기간 중 급여 등 처우에 차등이 없습니다.
  • 제출해 주신 내용 중 허위 사실이 있을 경우 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 사전에 안내된 채용 절차 외에도 추가 면접 전형이 진행될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 지원자의 동의 하에 평판조회 절차가 진행될 수 있으며, 평판조회 결과에 따라 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.
  • 병역특례요원의 경우, 병역특례 관련법에 따라 복무관리를 진행합니다.

descriptionBody:
[Hyper-X]

“우리는 최신 기술을 활용한 글로벌 제품을 만듭니다.”

Hyper-X 팀의 미션은, 현 시대의 최신 기술들을 활용하여 세상에 임팩트를 줄 수 있는 프로덕트를 만들고, 글로벌 시장에 출시하여 더 많은 사용자들과 새로운 경험을 나누는 것입니다. 창업한 그 순간부터 늘 창조적인 길을 개척해 온 하이퍼커넥트의 DNA와 혁신적인 기술, 그리고 매치그룹의 탄탄한 지원을 바탕으로 글로벌을 향한 도전을 계속합니다.

팀에 합류하시면,
- 상상력과 열정을 발휘할 수 있는 팀과 함께 Zero to One을 만들어갈 수 있습니다.
- 글로벌 시장에서 성공 경험을 이끈 하이퍼커넥트 멤버들과 Match Group의 글로벌 팀과 협업할 수 있습니다.
- 모든 멤버가 자신의 전문 분야를 뛰어넘어 자유롭게 의견을 나누고 협력하는 문화를 경험할 수 있습니다.

additionalPlain:
雇用形態
・正社員（試用期間:3ヶ月）

給与
・基本給＋45時間分みなし残業代＋賞与／経験・能力を考慮の上、当社規定により決定いたします
・昇給：上長との定期面談があり、年に1回昇給を決定いたします
・賞与：業績貢献度に応じて年に1回支給いたします

勤務時間
・フレックスタイム制、ハイブリッドリモート

休日・休暇
年間休日：130日（2022年実績）
・完全週休2日制/土日祝休み
・夏季、冬季休暇
・有給休暇
・特別休暇（誕生日休暇、アニバーサリー休暇など）
・産前産後/育児休暇、生理休暇 etc.

descriptionPlain:
エウレカでは、国内最大級のオンラインデーティングサービス「Pairs」のAndroidエンジニアを募集します。エウレカでは、現在、累計会員数2,000万人を突破した恋活・婚活マッチングサービス「Pairs」を展開しています。これらのブランドの提供・拡大を通じてデーティングや婚活領域などのライフステージ領域でのリーダーシップを高めて、ミッションである"人生に「あってよかった」と思ってもらえるものを。"の実現を目指しています。
また、「Pairs」は収益面でもすでにワールドクラスのプロダクトへと成長していますが、日本国内でもアジアでもまだまだ大きなポテンシャルがあります。直近のフォーカスは更なる成長を続ける日本市場ですが、すでに展開済みの台湾や韓国などアジア市場での更なる拡大もスコープになる可能性があります。

この度、恋活・婚活マッチングサービス「Pairs」の成長を加速させるため、新たにAndroidエンジニアを募集します。
エンジニアとして、Pairsにおける機能開発・改善の企画から開発、リリースまで一貫して対応していただきます。また、Androidアプリの開発を継続的に進めていくための改善も行っていただきたいと考えています。

At Match Group (NASDAQ: MTCH), millions of members use our products every month and our customers go on tens of thousands of dates every single day. Our reach and impact are staggering. We believe that no business brings more happiness to more people than ours; we can never forget the impact we have on society and most importantly, our community members.Pairs (ペアーズ) is Match Group's flagship service and the leading online dating brand in Japan, used by more than 15 million people in Japan and Taiwan.
Since its launch 10 years ago in 2012, we have received success stories from over 500,000 people and gave birth to 7% of married couples in Japan in 2021.
Our mission is to spark meaningful connections for every single person worldwide. In the 20+ years since we pioneered online dating, hundreds of millions of members from all ages, races, genders, sexual orientations, and backgrounds have used our apps to form meaningful connections.

We are currently seeking the Android Engineer to accelerate the growth of our dating and matchmaking service "Pairs." 
You will be responsible for the entire process of planning, developing, and releasing new features and improvements for Pairs. This role will also be expected to contribute to ongoing enhancements to the Android app development.



メッセージ
恋活・婚活マッチングサービス「Pairs」の成長を加速させるため、新たにAndroidエンジニアを募集します。
エンジニアとして、Pairsにおける機能開発・改善の企画から開発、リリースまで一貫して対応していただきます。また、Androidアプリの開発を継続的に進めていくための改善も行っていただきたいと考えています。

We are currently seeking an Android Engineer to accelerate the growth of our dating and matchmaking service "Pairs." 
You will be responsible for the entire process of planning, developing, and releasing new features and improvements for Pairs. This role is also expected to contribute to ongoing enhancements to the Android app development.


業務内容:
1. PairsのAndroidアプリ開発 
 - 新機能開発や既存機能改善のプロジェクトに所属してアプリ開発を行っていただきます
 - プロジェクトではスクラム開発を採用しており、スピード感を持って開発を行います
 - また、開発業務だけでなく、全員が物事を主体的に推進することを期待しています
2. 継続的に開発を続けていくための改善
 - 継続的にメンテナンスを続けていくために必要な改善の推進も行っていただきます
 - 最新動向を常にキャッチアップし、必要なものを取り込んでいくような動きを期待しています

1. Android app development for Pairs
 - You will be involved in projects for developing new features and improving existing functionalities of the app;
 - The projects follow the Scrum development methodology, emphasizing speed and efficiency;
 - We expect everyone to proactively drive initiatives, not limited to development tasks.
2. Continuous improvement for ongoing development
 - You will be responsible for driving necessary improvements to ensure continuous development and maintenance;
 - We expect you to stay updated with the latest trends and incorporate relevant advancements into the app.

lists.content:
• コラボレーションを前提としたプロジェクトを推進する姿勢
  • 品質向上や開発効率向上を目的としたプログラミングスキルと知識を向上させる姿勢
  • JavaまたはKotlinを使ったAndroidアプリ開発の経験
  • Web APIなどを通してデータの取得や更新など、再入可能性を考慮した非同期プログラミングを活用したアプリ開発経験
  • ビジネスレベル以上の日本語スキル

  • Attitude of driving projects with a collaborative mindset;
  • Strong commitment to improving programming skills and knowledge for the purpose of enhancing quality and development efficiency;
  • Experience in Android app development using Java or Kotlin;
  • Experience in app development utilizing asynchronous programming with considerations for re-entrancy, such as data retrieval and updates through Web APIs;
  • Business-level or above proficiency in Japanese language.

• 英語を使ったコミュニケーションスキル
  • Androidアプリ開発におけるテックリードやアーキテクトとしての経験
  • 個人アプリのリリース経験
  • OSS開発者としての経験

  • Business-level or above English proficiency for effective communication;
  • Experience as a tech lead or architect in Android app development;
  • Experience in releasing personal apps;
  • Experience as an open-source software (OSS) developer.

At Match Group (NASDAQ: MTCH), millions of members use our products every month and our customers go on tens of thousands of dates every single day. Our reach and impact are staggering. We believe that no business brings more happiness to more people than ours; we can never forget the impact we have on society and most importantly, our community members.Pairs (ペアーズ) is Match Group's flagship service and the leading online dating brand in Japan, used by more than 15 million people in Japan and Taiwan.
Since its launch 10 years ago in 2012, we have received success stories from over 500,000 people and gave birth to 7% of married couples in Japan in 2021.
Our mission is to spark meaningful connections for every single person worldwide. In the 20+ years since we pioneered online dating, hundreds of millions of members from all ages, races, genders, sexual orientations, and backgrounds have used our apps to form meaningful connections.

We are currently seeking the Android Engineer to accelerate the growth of our dating and matchmaking service "Pairs." 
You will be responsible for the entire process of planning, developing, and releasing new features and improvements for Pairs. This role will also be expected to contribute to ongoing enhancements to the Android app development.



メッセージ
恋活・婚活マッチングサービス「Pairs」の成長を加速させるため、新たにAndroidエンジニアを募集します。
エンジニアとして、Pairsにおける機能開発・改善の企画から開発、リリースまで一貫して対応していただきます。また、Androidアプリの開発を継続的に進めていくための改善も行っていただきたいと考えています。

We are currently seeking an Android Engineer to accelerate the growth of our dating and matchmaking service "Pairs." 
You will be responsible for the entire process of planning, developing, and releasing new features and improvements for Pairs. This role is also expected to contribute to ongoing enhancements to the Android app development.


業務内容:
1. PairsのAndroidアプリ開発 
 - 新機能開発や既存機能改善のプロジェクトに所属してアプリ開発を行っていただきます
 - プロジェクトではスクラム開発を採用しており、スピード感を持って開発を行います
 - また、開発業務だけでなく、全員が物事を主体的に推進することを期待しています
2. 継続的に開発を続けていくための改善
 - 継続的にメンテナンスを続けていくために必要な改善の推進も行っていただきます
 - 最新動向を常にキャッチアップし、必要なものを取り込んでいくような動きを期待しています

1. Android app development for Pairs
 - You will be involved in projects for developing new features and improving existing functionalities of the app;
 - The projects follow the Scrum development methodology, emphasizing speed and efficiency;
 - We expect everyone to proactively drive initiatives, not limited to development tasks.
2. Continuous improvement for ongoing development
 - You will be responsible for driving necessary improvements to ensure continuous development and maintenance;
 - We expect you to stay updated with the latest trends and incorporate relevant advancements into the app.

descriptionPlain:
Founded in Vancouver, Canada in 2003, Plenty of Fish is one of the early pioneers in the online dating industry, with one of the largest and most diverse communities of singles. We're one of the top revenue-driving brands in the Match Group (comprised of Tinder, OkCupid, Hinge and Match.com).

We love what we do, and have the ability to profoundly impact millions of people's lives every single day! Named one of BC’s Top Employers, Plenty of Fish is a great place to build friendships, grow your career and collaborate with top talent.

We work hybrid at Plenty of Fish - IRL in our downtown Vancouver office Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and work remotely the remainder of the week!

We're always looking to connect with people who resonate with our values and who want to make an impact in one of the most important things in our members lives, helping them find their partner. If you don't see the role you are looking for posted on our careers site please apply here! 

You'll receive an automated notification to let you know we've received your application, and our team will reach out if and when we have a role available that may be a good match.

descriptionPlain:
Our Mission

As humans, there are few things more exciting than meeting someone new. At Tinder, we’re inspired by the challenge of keeping the magic of human connection alive. With tens of millions of users, hundreds of millions of downloads, 2+ billion swipes per day, 20+ million matches per day, and a presence in 190+ countries, our reach is expansive—and rapidly growing.
 
We work together to solve complex problems. Behind the simplicity of every match, we think deeply about human relationships, behavioral science, network economics, AI and ML, online and real-world safety, cultural nuances, loneliness, love, sex, and more.

The Team

There are internships and then there's the Tindership program. Forget boring busywork—spend your summer as part of our team, making a real impact on our business. Tinder interns gain a meaningful experience connecting with their mentor and managers, participating in large-scale projects, and collaborating with other interns in our flagship Tindership hackathon. You’ll join an inclusive workplace and gain real-world experiences and exposure to Tinder's culture.

About the Role

As a Backend Intern at Tinder, you will partner directly with senior members of the Engineering team and be empowered to contribute solutions to Tinder's backend system. We are deeply invested in challenging norms, constantly improving architecture design, exploring emergent tech and ideas, and leveraging new technologies in interesting ways to deliver an app that is widely known the world over.  

Where you’ll work

This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. The position will be located in Los Angeles, CA.

About the Role

As a Backend Intern at Tinder, you will partner directly with senior members of the Engineering team and be empowered to contribute solutions to Tinder's backend system. We are deeply invested in challenging norms, constantly improving architecture design, exploring emergent tech and ideas, and leveraging new technologies in interesting ways to deliver an app that is widely known the world over.  

Where you’ll work

This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. The position will be located in Los Angeles, CA.

lists.content:
• Collaborate across Tinder Engineering on the expansion of our service platform
  • Develop and operate scalable and resilient distributed services that run on Amazon Web Services (AWS)
  • Build large scale distributed systems that handle billions of data events a day
  • Write unit and integration tests 
  • Participate in the annual Tindership Hackathon, presenting with your team to the entire Tinder team and panel of executives.

• Aspiring backend developer who’s excited to work on large scale challenges with cutting-edge technology
  • Proficiency in coding with at least one language (Java, Scala, Python,Typescript, Nodejs, etc.)
  • Foundational knowledge of basic Computer Science principles: data structures and algorithms.
  • Currently pursuing a BS/BA, MS, or PhD in Computer Science or a related field (Graduation date of December 2024 onward)

• Prior internship or work experience on backend systems
  • Completed relevant project experience (i.e. hack-a-thons, personal projects, GitHub, Open Source, volunteer coding experience etc.)
  • Knowledge of technologies such as; Protocol Buffers, gRPC, Apache Kafka, Apache Flink, ElasticSearch, Redis
  • Aware of AWS technologies like; DynamoDB, S3, RDS, ElastiCache

lists.text: As part of our team, you'll enjoy:
lists.content:
• The liveliness of a startup with the impact of a global business
  • Collaborating with a team of creative, fun and driven colleagues 
  • Working with an extraordinary team of smart, creative, fun, and highly motivated people
  • Competitive hourly pay and flexible working schedule
  • Comprehensive health coverage, 401(k) 
  • Access to mental health resources
  • Virtual yoga and fitness classes, and many other fun activities
  • Virtual celebrations, parties, socials, and more
  • A robust Learning + Development offering including our MentorMatch program, access to a library of 6,000+ online learning courses through Udemy
  • Fully customized computer equipment to fit your needs
  • The opportunity to join 8+ active Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)

salaryDescription: Factors such as scope and responsibilities of the position, candidate's work experience, education/training, job-related skills, internal peer equity, as well as market and business considerations may influence base pay offered. This salary range is reflective of a position based in Los Angeles. This salary will be subject to a geographic adjustment (according to a specific city and state), if an authorization is granted to work outside of the location listed in this posting.

additionalPlain:
As a member of our team, you’ll enjoy:

401(k) Matching: We match 100% of the first 10% of pre-tax 401(k) contributions you make, up to a maximum of $10,000 per year.

Professional Growth: Get a $3,000 annual Learning & Development stipend once you’ve been with us for three months. You also get free access to Udemy, an online learning and teaching marketplace with over 6000 courses, starting your first day.

Parental Leave & Planning: When you become a new parent, you’re eligible for 100% paid parental leave (20 paid weeks for both birth and non-birth parents.)

Fertility Support: You’ll get easy access to fertility care through Carrot, from basic treatments to fertility preservation. We also provide $10,000 toward fertility preservation. You and your spouse/domestic partner are both eligible.

Date Stipend: All Hinge employees receive a $100 monthly stipend for epic dates– Romantic or otherwise. Hinge Premium is also free for employees and their loved ones.

ERGs: We have eight Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)—Asian, Unapologetic, Disability, LGBTQIA+, Vibras, Women/Nonbinary, Parents, and Remote—that hold regular meetings, host events, and provide dedicated support to the organization & its community.

At Hinge, our core values are…

Authenticity: We share, never hide, our words, actions and intentions.

Courage: We embrace lofty goals and tough challenges.

Empathy: We deeply consider the perspective of others.

Diversity inspires innovation

Hinge is an equal-opportunity employer. We value diversity at our company and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We believe success is created by a diverse workforce of individuals with different ideas, strengths, interests, and cultural backgrounds.

If you require reasonable accommodation to complete a job application, pre-employment testing, or a job interview or to otherwise participate in the hiring process, please contact employeebenefits@matchgroup.com.

descriptionPlain:
Hinge is the dating app designed to be deleted

In today's digital world, finding genuine relationships is tougher than ever. At Hinge, we’re on a mission to inspire intimate connection to create a less lonely world. We’re obsessed with understanding our users’ behaviors to help them find love, and our success is defined by one simple metric– setting up great dates. With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

About the Role 

We are seeking a Backend Engineering Manager to join our team at Hinge. 

In this role, you will lead the team responsible for the backend services that uphold the integrity of the Hinge ecosystem. Your focus will be on enabling your team to build product features that enhance user safety. As a Backend Engineering Manager, you will also play a key role in establishing and nurturing team cross-functional processes that encourage teamwork and clear communication.

With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

About the Role

We are seeking a Backend Engineering Manager to join our team at Hinge. 

In this role, you will lead the team responsible for the backend services that uphold the integrity of the Hinge ecosystem. Your focus will be on enabling your team to build product features that enhance user safety. As a Backend Engineering Manager, you will also play a key role in establishing and nurturing team cross-functional processes that encourage teamwork and clear communication.

lists.content:
• Develop an engineering roadmap for your team that supports both short and long term product goals.
  • Identify technical gaps and opportunities in the team's ownership domain by staying plugged into developments in the broader tech industry and in your team’s codebase.
  • Monitor Backend systems to continuously evaluate their performance, ensuring that these systems are meeting the demands of the business.
  • Contribute to the architecture of your team’s systems
  • Communicate effectively to audiences of various technical and non-technical backgrounds.
  • Own the effectiveness of the backend Trust and Safety engineering team by managing the portfolio of technical skills on the team, and providing coaching/mentoring/feedback for IC’s.
  • Perform other job-related duties as assigned.

• Strong programming skills: Prior experience with Go is preferred, or proficiency in popular languages like Python, C#, Java, Kotlin, Typescript/JS.
  • System design & architecture: Be familiar with common cloud infrastructure services (e.g. queues, k-v stores, relational data stores) and distributed system concepts (e.g. state machine replication, etc.).  Have experience designing and building scalable web applications in a microservice architecture.
  • Cloud platform proficiency: Ability to utilize common cloud environments such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.
  • Communication & Collaboration skills: Ability to work effectively in a team and communicate complex technical ideas clearly for both technical and non-technical audiences. 
  • Strong written communication: Ability to communicate complex ideas and technical knowledge through writing (e.g. efficient slack communication, effective technical documentation and knowledge-base organization/management). 
  • Leadership skills:  Puts the needs of the team first.  Tends towards ownership.  Has a track record of leading projects through completion, and proactively solves problems when they present themselves. 
  • 5+ years of industry experience in an IC software engineer/developer role
  • 2+ years of experience leading projects with at least 2 other team members.
  • 2+ years of experience building scalable cloud services with either AWS, GCP, or Azure.

Date Stipend: All Hinge employees receive a $100 monthly stipend for epic dates– Romantic or otherwise. Hinge Premium is also free for employees and their loved ones.

ERGs: We have eight Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)—Asian, Unapologetic, Disability, LGBTQIA+, Vibras, Women/Nonbinary, Parents, and Remote—that hold regular meetings, host events, and provide dedicated support to the organization & its community.

At Hinge, our core values are…

Authenticity: We share, never hide, our words, actions and intentions.

Courage: We embrace lofty goals and tough challenges.

Empathy: We deeply consider the perspective of others.

Diversity inspires innovation

Hinge is an equal-opportunity employer. We value diversity at our company and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We believe success is created by a diverse workforce of individuals with different ideas, strengths, interests, and cultural backgrounds.

If you require reasonable accommodation to complete a job application, pre-employment testing, or a job interview or to otherwise participate in the hiring process, please contact employeebenefits@matchgroup.com.
additional:

401(k) Matching: We match 100% of the first 10% of pre-tax 401(k) contributions you make, up to a maximum of $10,000 per year.

Professional Growth: Get a $3,000 annual Learning & Development stipend once you’ve been with us for three months. You also get free access to Udemy, an online learning and teaching marketplace with over 6000 courses, starting your first day.

Parental Leave & Planning: When you become a new parent, you’re eligible for 100% paid parental leave (20 paid weeks for both birth and non-birth parents.)

descriptionPlain:
Hinge is the dating app designed to be deleted

In today's digital world, finding genuine relationships is tougher than ever. At Hinge, we’re on a mission to inspire intimate connection to create a less lonely world. We’re obsessed with understanding our users’ behaviors to help them find love, and our success is defined by one simple metric– setting up great dates. With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

About the Role: 

Hinge is seeking an experienced Backend Engineering Manager to join our team and play a critical role in shaping users' dating journeys. Your team will be responsible for the backend services that drive user accounts, profiles, actions, and notifications. 

As a Backend Engineering Manager, you'll contribute significantly to establishing and nurturing team processes that foster teamwork and clear communication. You’ll collaborate closely with a diverse group, including direct reports, technical leads, data scientists, engineers, engineering managers, and product managers.

About the Role:

Hinge is seeking an experienced Backend Engineering Manager to join our team and play a critical role in shaping users' dating journeys. Your team will be responsible for the backend services that drive user accounts, profiles, actions, and notifications. 

As a Backend Engineering Manager, you'll contribute significantly to establishing and nurturing team processes that foster teamwork and clear communication. You’ll collaborate closely with a diverse group, including direct reports, technical leads, data scientists, engineers, engineering managers, and product managers.

lists.content:
• Develop an engineering roadmap for your team that supports both short and long term product goals.
  • Identify technical gaps and opportunities in the team’s ownership domain by staying plugged into developments in the broader tech industry and in your team’s codebase.
  • Monitor Backend systems to continuously evaluate their performance, ensuring that these systems are meeting the demands of the business.
  • Contribute to the architecture of your team’s systems
  • Communicate effectively to audiences of various technical and non-technical backgrounds.
  • Own the effectiveness of the backend UserCore engineering team by managing the portfolio of technical skills on the team, and providing coaching/mentoring/feedback for IC’s.
  • Perform other job-related duties as assigned.

• Strong programming skills: Prior experience with Go is preferred, but we're open to strong proficiency in popular languages like Python, C#, Java, Kotlin, Typescript/JS. The ability to quickly understand and navigate an established code base.
  • System design & architecture: Ability to quickly understand and navigate an established code base, familiarity with common cloud infrastructure services (e.g. queues, k-v stores, relational data stores) and distributed system concepts (e.g. state machine replication, etc.), experience designing and building scalable web applications in a microservice architecture.
  • Cloud platform proficiency: Ability to utilize common cloud environments such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.
  • Effective collaborator: You can to work effectively on teams and communicate complex technical ideas clearly for both technical and non-technical audiences. 
  • Strong written communication: Ability to communicate complex ideas and technical knowledge through writing. 
  • Innovative Leadership: Team-first leadership and a tendency to help teams work efficiently get stuff done. A track record of leading projects through completion, and proactively solves problems when they present themselves. 
  • 6+ years of industry experience in an IC software engineer/developer role.
  • 3+ years of experience leading engineering teams with at least 4 team members.
  • 4+ years of experience building scalable cloud services with either AWS, GCP, or Azure.
  • Experience building software applications that involve significant amounts of data processing and throughput.

salaryDescription: Factors such as scope and responsibilities of the position, candidate's work experience, education/training, job-related skills, internal peer equity, as well as market and business considerations may influence base pay offered. This salary range is reflective of a position based in New York City. This salary will be subject to a geographic adjustment (according to a specific city and state), if an authorization is granted to work outside of the location listed in this posting.

descriptionPlain:
Meetic is the European leader in dating services operating in 21 countries. 
As the source of more than 8 million couples, Meetic works to create the best user experience whether online, mobile or at the many events organized every week across Europe.

A company focusing on a human philosophy, supported by the strength of an international group, our teams develop products with a strong social impact.
In recent years, Meetic has placed people and sustainability at the center of its focus through concrete actions: such as a green IT approach (reduction of servers, web eco-design, zero plastic...), friendly work environment, emergency leaves, WFH policy, work-life balance etc…

Take a look at our page: https://www.meetic-europe.com/

Working closely with our US tech team, the Meetic teams are building a technical international platform that addresses multiple challenges. These include setting up a state-of-the-art resilient architecture, solving complex scaling questions, and creating new features.

This strategic project requires us to define short and long-term strategies, as well as hiring a team based in Paris.
description:
Meetic is the European leader in dating services operating in 21 countries. 
As the source of more than 8 million couples, Meetic works to create the best user experience whether online, mobile or at the many events organized every week across Europe.

A company focusing on a human philosophy, supported by the strength of an international group, our teams develop products with a strong social impact.
In recent years, Meetic has placed people and sustainability at the center of its focus through concrete actions: such as a green IT approach (reduction of servers, web eco-design, zero plastic...), friendly work environment, emergency leaves, WFH policy, work-life balance etc…

Take a look at our page: https://www.meetic-europe.com/

Working closely with our US tech team, the Meetic teams are building a technical international platform that addresses multiple challenges. These include setting up a state-of-the-art resilient architecture, solving complex scaling questions, and creating new features.

This strategic project requires us to define short and long-term strategies, as well as hiring a team based in Paris.

lists.content:
• You will develop applications that implement the business logic of Meetic and Match apps. These applications manipulate and produce user and business data, and expose APIs to frontend applications.
  • You will implement unit and functional tests to ensure the long-term quality of the software you develop.
  • You will contribute to the development and maintenance of tools necessary for building and deploying the backend applications of Meetic and Match.
  • You will make proposals to contribute to the maintainability and coherence of the technical stack.
  • You will contribute to organizing developments within your team, and develop technical solutions that meet the needs of Match, Meetic, and their users.
  • You will self-organize tasks assigned to you or tasks you have assigned to yourself to provide visibility into their progress. You will estimate the time required to complete these tasks and give yourself the means to meet your estimates.

• You hold a degree in computer science or have equivalent professional experience.
  • You have a strong background in developing applications at scale, with at least 2-3 years of experience in C# and .Net development.
  • You have experience working in systems where robustness, scalability, performance, and innovation are key.
  • You have experience with distributed systems.
  • You produce high-quality code that is thoroughly tested and maintainable by the entire team.
  • You are familiar with the "Clean Code" philosophy and apply it in your work every day. You are proficient in unit and functional testing, and have a good understanding of design patterns that optimize software architecture.
  • You are autonomous and responsible for your developments from start to finish: implementation, testing, continuous improvement of the application architecture, and production release.
  • You are proficient in debugging techniques and observability tools for systems in production.
  • You actively participate in workshops to invent new features and create new systems with other teams.
  • You are fluent in English at least in written form, and are comfortable working in a multicultural environment.

• You are passionate about software engineering.
  • You are curious, creative, open-minded, and convinced by Agile principles.
  • You have a strong desire to share knowledge with your colleagues, particularly through eXtreme Programming practices such as code reviews and mob-programming.
  • You have a passion for software craftsmanship.
  • You possess the ability to provide constructive and useful feedback. Additionally, you actively seek feedback from your colleagues and manager to utilize it as a tool to develop your skills.
  • You know how to communicate in writing and orally in a concise, clear, and effective manner. You actively listen to others and make sure they are understood by you and your colleagues.
  • You enjoy working in a team and strive to improve the way your team collaborates, as well as the associated processes and rituals.

descriptionPlain:
[Enterprise 조직 소개]

Enterprise 팀은 Hyperconnect의 축적된 기술력을 글로벌 비즈니스 서비스로 제공하여, 기술적 리더십을 확장하고 더 큰 시장에서 함께 성장해가는 것을 목표로 합니다. Azar, Hakuna 의 연속된 성공을 통해 가치가 입증된 핵심 기술을 국내외의 타사 서비스에 쉽고 빠르게 적용할 수 있도록 SDK 형태로 제공하고, 클라우드 서비스를 통해 운영과 최적화에 대한 노하우 및 도구를 제공합니다. 

비디오, AI 등의 기술 요소 뿐만 아니라 사용자 인터페이스 요소를 포함한 다양한 기능을 통합한 완전한 형식의 플랫폼을 제공합니다. 최소한의 노력으로 구현할 수 있는 풀 서비스 플랫폼을 구축하여 고객이 유저들에게 풍부한 경험을 제공하면서 성장과 수익화 기회를 극대화하는 팀입니다. 

글로벌 규모의 B2B 플랫폼을 만드는 개발팀의 일원으로서, 백엔드 엔지니어는 B2B 와 B2C 의 도전들을 동시에 대면하여 개발, 테스트, 유지 보수, 운영 등 플랫폼의 라이프사이클에서 발생하는 모든 문제들을 해결하기 위한 활동들을 수행합니다. 

마이크로서비스 구조의 백엔드는 주로 Spring / Kotlin 과 RDBMS 를 표준으로 구성되어 있기는 하지만, 문제를 해결하기 위해서는 기술스택에 특별히 구애 받지 않습니다.

lists.content:
• 라이브 스트리밍 플랫폼의 전반적인 백엔드 아키텍처 설계 및 구현
  • 글로벌 개발자와 협업하여 전 세계 사용자들을 위한 플랫폼 개발
  • 안정적, 효율적 스트리밍을 위한 서버 개발 / 유지 보수
  • 사내/외 API 개발 및 관리
  • 신규 기능 설계 및 구현 
  • 백엔드 서버 유지 보수 및 운영 
  • 동료의 코드 리뷰를 통한 협업 강화 및 지식 공유
  • 각종 테스트 설계 및 수행

• ​2년 이상의 백엔드 서버 개발 실무 또는 그에 준하는 경험
  • JVM 에코시스템에 대한 깊은 이해
  • HTTP 등 인터넷 기반 기술에 대한 이해
  • CS 전공 혹은 그에 준하는 탄탄한 기초 지식을 보유한 분
  • RDBMS에 대한 깊은 이해 및 실무 경험이 있는 분
  • Monolithic / MSA 기본적인 이해를 보유한 분
  • 설계에 대한 열정이 있고, 서로 원만한 소통을 통해 협력적으로 코드 리뷰를 진행할 수 있는 분

• Microservice 와 Kubernetes 관련 경험
  • NoSQL (Cassandra, MongoDB, Redis, ElasticSearch 등) 이용한 분산 저장소 설계 및 개발 대한 지식이 있거나 분
  • 글로벌 고객사 개발자와의 협업에 거부감이 없는
  • Event Driven 등을 이용한 대용량 분산 처리 시스템의 개발 및 성능 튜닝 경험이 있으신 분
  • 동료와의 의견 대립 상황에서 원활한 커뮤니케이션 및 협상 능력을 가진 분

• 고용 형태: 정규직
  • 채용 절차: 서류전형 > 코딩테스트/사전과제 > Recruiter Call > 1차 면접 > 2차 면접 > 3차 면접(필요 시) > 최종합격
  • 근무 시간: 근무시간을 자율적으로 선택하는DIY(Do It Yourself) 근무제 (단, 병무청 복무규정에 따라 산업기능요원, 전문연구요원은 시차출근제 적용 - 오전 8시 ~ 11시 사이 출근)
  • 지원 서류: 자유 양식의 상세 경력 기반 국문 또는 영문 이력서(PDF)

• 하이퍼커넥트는 증명사진, 주민등록번호, 가족관계, 혼인여부 등 채용과 관계없는 개인정보를 요구하지 않습니다.
  • 수습기간 중 급여 등 처우에 차등이 없습니다.
  • 제출해 주신 내용 중 허위 사실이 있을 경우 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 사전에 안내된 채용 절차 외에도 추가 면접 전형이 진행될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 지원자의 동의 하에 평판 조회 절차가 진행될 수 있으며, 평판 조회 결과에 따라 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.

descriptionBody:
[Enterprise 조직 소개]

Enterprise 팀은 Hyperconnect의 축적된 기술력을 글로벌 비즈니스 서비스로 제공하여, 기술적 리더십을 확장하고 더 큰 시장에서 함께 성장해가는 것을 목표로 합니다. Azar, Hakuna 의 연속된 성공을 통해 가치가 입증된 핵심 기술을 국내외의 타사 서비스에 쉽고 빠르게 적용할 수 있도록 SDK 형태로 제공하고, 클라우드 서비스를 통해 운영과 최적화에 대한 노하우 및 도구를 제공합니다.

비디오, AI 등의 기술 요소 뿐만 아니라 사용자 인터페이스 요소를 포함한 다양한 기능을 통합한 완전한 형식의 플랫폼을 제공합니다. 최소한의 노력으로 구현할 수 있는 풀 서비스 플랫폼을 구축하여 고객이 유저들에게 풍부한 경험을 제공하면서 성장과 수익화 기회를 극대화하는 팀입니다.

글로벌 규모의 B2B 플랫폼을 만드는 개발팀의 일원으로서, 백엔드 엔지니어는 B2B 와 B2C 의 도전들을 동시에 대면하여 개발, 테스트, 유지 보수, 운영 등 플랫폼의 라이프사이클에서 발생하는 모든 문제들을 해결하기 위한 활동들을 수행합니다.

마이크로서비스 구조의 백엔드는 주로 Spring / Kotlin 과 RDBMS 를 표준으로 구성되어 있기는 하지만, 문제를 해결하기 위해서는 기술스택에 특별히 구애 받지 않습니다.

additionalPlain:
복리후생

하이퍼커넥트는 개인의 삶이 만족스러워야 회사에서도 만족감을 찾을 수 있다고 믿습니다.
진짜 중요한 일에만 집중할 수 있는 기업문화와 다양한 복리후생을 지속적으로 발전시키며 하이퍼커넥터의 건강과 삶, 그리고 행복한 회사생활을 위해 노력합니다.

#Work 업무에 몰입할 수 있도록 아낌없이 지원합니다.
하이브리드 근무제 원격과 오피스 근무의 장점을 담아 근무장소 자율 선택 (주2회 조직단위 출근 필수)
DIY근무제 근무/휴게 시간 자율 계획 (1개월 단위 소정근로시간 내) 불필요한 야근/주말근무 지양
최고의 오피스 이동이 편리한 위치 (2호선 삼성/9호선 봉은사역을 잇는 더블 역세권)아셈타워 내 쾌적한 근무공간 
고성능 최신 장비 최고 수준의 업무용 장비 제공 최신 기술 활용에 적극 투자

#Life 생활에 걸림돌이 될 수 있는 문제들을 해결하고자 노력합니다.
사내 카페(Hypresso) 운영 바리스타 상주, 수제 음료 및 베이커리 무료 이용
식사 및 간식 지원 아침(김밥 등 간편식), 점심(식대 1만 2천 원), 저녁(야근 시) 편의점급 스낵바 상시 운영
단체보험 가입 및 건강검진 지원 직원 단체보험 및 연 1회 건강검진 제공 (전액 회사 부담)
사내 대출 지원 생활 안정 위한 저금리 대출 지원 (근속기간 충족 시)
경조금/경조휴가 지급 경조휴가, 경조금 및 화환 지원
명절 선물 지급 30만 원 상당의 선물 제공 (옵션 제공, 선택 가능)

#Growth 개인의 커리어 성장이 회사의 성장으로도 이어진다는 믿음으로 개인의 성장을 전폭적으로 지원합니다.
뛰어난 동료들과 협업 전 세계 22개국 이상에서 모인 글로벌 동료들과 협업하며 성장
글로벌 서비스 경험 가치를 인정받은 글로벌 서비스로 진정한 글로벌 노하우를 경험
외국어 교육 지원 사외 외국어 학습 비용 지원
직무 관련 교육 지원 글로벌 온라인 교육 플랫폼 Udemy 무료 이용, 직무 관련 최신 세미나/컨퍼런스 참가 비용 전액 지원, 직무 관련 사외교육 비용 지원
도서 지원 역사/인문/인물/자기계발/자연과학/경제경영/IT모바일 관련 도서 무제한 신청 가능

#Refresh 충분한 휴식과 재충전을 지원합니다.
휴식 공간 1만 권 이상의 만화책, 게임기, 당구대, 멀티룸 등을 갖춘 편안한 휴식 공간 보유
헬스키퍼 전문 안마사의 마사지를 받을 수 있는 힐링존 운영
사내 커뮤니티 활동 각종 동호회 활동 지원 팀/직무와 관계없이 교류할 수 있는 그룹 런치 운영
장기근속 휴가 매 3년 근속 시 휴가(10일) 및 휴가비(200만 원) 제공
생일 축하 본인 생일 선물(상품권 20만 원) 및 생일 반차 제공가족 생일 반반차 제공(부모/배우자/자녀)


하이퍼커넥트가 채용하는 포지션에 지원하는 경우, 개인정보 처리에 관하여서는 본 개인정보처리방침이 적용됩니다: https://career.hyperconnect.com/privacy

descriptionPlain:
[Azar - Matching Dev Team 소개]

하이퍼커넥트의 대표 Product인 Azar 는 2013년 첫 출시 이후 지금까지 많은 유저들에게 사랑받고 있습니다. 8년이 넘는 기간동안 서비스의 핵심 기능으로는 즉각적으로 영상을 통해 새로운 사람들을 만나는 기회를 제공하는 1:1 Video Chat이 굳건하게 자리를 지키고 있습니다. 많은 후발 주자 서비스들이 등장했음에도 이러한 Instant Video Chat 시장의 선두를 지키고 있고, 하루에 수천만건의 대화를 연결시켜 주고 있습니다. 틴더와 같은 유명한 데이팅 서비스들을 다수 보유하고 있는 매치그룹에 하이퍼커넥트가 인수된 이후에도 아자르의 Video Chat이 가지고 있는 전세계의 시장의 유저들과 창출하는 수익은 여전히 중요하게 여겨지고 있습니다.

아자르 매칭개발팀에서는 초당 몇백건씩 들어오는 유저들의 요청을 받아 빠르게 대화할 상대방을 논리적으로 결정하는 Match Making을 담당하고 있습니다. 유저의 직접적인 선호와 국가와 언어와 같은 간접적인 Context 를 모두 고려해 유저들에게 좋은 경험을 진행할 수 있는 상대방을 정해주면서도, 동시에 적절한 성능 튜닝을 통해 유저가 기다리는 대기시간을 최소화해야 한다는 까다로운 문제를 풀어나가고 있습니다.

현재 매칭 개발팀에서는 이러한 문제를 풀기 위해 분산 스트리밍 데이터 처리 엔진인 flink를 메인으로 사용하고 있습니다. flink를 통해 실시간으로 들어오는 사용자들의 요청들을 event-driven 방식으로 처리하고, 트래픽에 따라 유연하게 어플리케이션을 확장할 수 있게 하며, 분산 처리의 핵심인 로드 밸런싱을 쉽게 커스터마이징 하고 있습니다. 또한 flink 는 stateful streaming 을 지원하기 때문에 사용자의 컨텍스트를 flink state 로 저장하여 낮은 latency 를 유지하면서도 Match Making 알고리즘 성능을 개선시킬 수 있었습니다.

대부분의 일들은 뛰어난 동료들을 자랑하는 다른 팀들과의 협업으로 진행됩니다. AWS 기반 Kubernetes 환경에서의 배포와 인프라 관리를 DevOps팀의 도움을 받아 진행하고 있고, WebRTC 통신이나 ML Model을 전문적으로 연구하는 개발팀들과도 긴밀하게 일하게 됩니다. 이러한 체계적인 개발 환경에서 팀의 고유 개발 영역과 그 목표를 달성하는 것에 집중하려고 하고 있습니다.

아자르는 글로벌 서비스로 대부분의 유저들이 한국이 아닌 글로벌 유저들입니다. 이러한 서비스 특성상 다양한 국가의 유저들의 언어, 특수한 문화, 법률, 특성과 같은 평소에 접하기 힘든 부분을 고려한 기획을 접할 수 있고, 이러한 요구사항을 유연하게 다루기 위한 설계 역시 필수적입니다. 글로벌 서비스에서 보편적이면서도 지역적 특색을 살려 비지니스 효과를 높이는 프로젝트들을 접할 수 있습니다.

Azar Backend 기술블로그 살펴보기(Link)
description:
[Azar - Matching Dev Team 소개]

하이퍼커넥트의 대표 Product인 Azar 는 2013년 첫 출시 이후 지금까지 많은 유저들에게 사랑받고 있습니다. 8년이 넘는 기간동안 서비스의 핵심 기능으로는 즉각적으로 영상을 통해 새로운 사람들을 만나는 기회를 제공하는 1:1 Video Chat이 굳건하게 자리를 지키고 있습니다. 많은 후발 주자 서비스들이 등장했음에도 이러한 Instant Video Chat 시장의 선두를 지키고 있고, 하루에 수천만건의 대화를 연결시켜 주고 있습니다. 틴더와 같은 유명한 데이팅 서비스들을 다수 보유하고 있는 매치그룹에 하이퍼커넥트가 인수된 이후에도 아자르의 Video Chat이 가지고 있는 전세계의 시장의 유저들과 창출하는 수익은 여전히 중요하게 여겨지고 있습니다.

대부분의 일들은 뛰어난 동료들을 자랑하는 다른 팀들과의 협업으로 진행됩니다. AWS 기반 Kubernetes 환경에서의 배포와 인프라 관리를 DevOps팀의 도움을 받아 진행하고 있고, WebRTC 통신이나 ML Model을 전문적으로 연구하는 개발팀들과도 긴밀하게 일하게 됩니다. 이러한 체계적인 개발 환경에서 팀의 고유 개발 영역과 그 목표를 달성하는 것에 집중하려고 하고 있습니다.

Azar Backend 기술블로그 살펴보기(Link)

lists.content:
• 서비스 유지보수 및 안정성 확보
    • - 동시에 많은 요청을 처리하는 고가용성 서비스를 유지보수합니다
    - 능동적인 모니터링을 통해 잠재적인 이슈를 발굴하고 예방합니다
    - 장애 상황에서의 이슈를 빠르게 대응합니다

  • 서비스 피쳐 개발 지원
    • - 클라이언트 업데이트를 위한 매칭 관련 신규 기능 개발을 지원합니다
    - ML Model 을 로직에 연동하고, 다양한 수요에 따른 Dynamic한 설정 업데이트를 지원합니다

  • 서비스 오퍼레이션 지원
    • - 조직의 비즈니스 목표 달성을 위해 마케팅이나 수익화와 같은 수요에 맞춰 오퍼레이션을 지원합니다.
    - 다른 팀과의 협업을 더 용이하게 하기 위한 툴과 프로세스를 고민합니다
    - QA 프로세스 진행을 서포트하고 CS 이슈를 디버깅합니다

  • 더 좋은 개발 조직 만들기
    • - 테스트 코드를 작성하고 동료들의 코드를 리뷰합니다
    - 다른 조직의 백엔드 엔지니어들과 의견을 교류하고, 테크블로그를 작성합니다.

• Backend Software Engineer로 3년 이상의 업무 경험이 있으시거나 관련 전공 석사 등의 그에 준하는 경력이 있으신 분
  • CS 전공 혹은 그에 준하는 탄탄한 기초 지식을 보유한 분
  • JVM 기반 Production 어플리케이션을 개발할 수 있으신 분
  • 분산 처리 시스템을 이해하고 있거나 큰 흥미를 가지고 있으신 분

• Flink 기반 서비스를 개발한 적이 있으신 분
  • Scala 관련 경험을 보유하신 분
  • 도메인 주도 설계에 관심이 있으신 분
  • 분산 처리 시스템을 실제로 Production에서 운영하셨던 분
  • 대용량의 데이터를 처리해 보신 분
  • 쿠버네티스 환경에서의 서비스 관리에 익숙하신 분
  • 비즈니스 데이터 분석으로부터 엔지니어링 측면에서의 액션 아이템을 고민하는 걸 좋아하는 분
  • 개인이 일을 잘 하는 것보다는 다른 사람들과 일이 실제로 되게 하는 것을 즐기는 분

• 고용 형태: 정규직
  • 채용 절차: 서류전형 > 코딩테스트/사전과제 > Recruiter Call > 1차 면접 > 2차 면접 > 3차 면접(필요 시) > 최종합격
  • 근무 시간: 근무시간을 자율적으로 선택하는DIY(Do It Yourself) 근무제 (단, 병무청 복무규정에 따라 산업기능요원, 전문연구요원은 시차출근제 적용 - 오전 8시 ~ 11시 사이 출근)
  • 지원 서류: 자유 양식의 상세 경력기반 국문 또는 영문이력서(PDF)

• 하이퍼커넥트는 증명사진, 주민등록번호, 가족관계, 혼인여부 등 채용과 관계없는 개인정보를 요구하지 않습니다.
  • 수습기간 중 급여 등 처우에 차등이 없습니다.
  • 제출해 주신 내용 중 허위 사실이 있을 경우 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 사전에 안내된 채용 절차 외에도 추가 면접 전형이 진행될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 지원자의 동의 하에 평판 조회 절차가 진행될 수 있으며, 평판 조회 결과에 따라 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.

하이퍼커넥트의 대표 Product인 Azar 는 2013년 첫 출시 이후 지금까지 많은 유저들에게 사랑받고 있습니다. 8년이 넘는 기간동안 서비스의 핵심 기능으로는 즉각적으로 영상을 통해 새로운 사람들을 만나는 기회를 제공하는 1:1 Video Chat이 굳건하게 자리를 지키고 있습니다. 많은 후발 주자 서비스들이 등장했음에도 이러한 Instant Video Chat 시장의 선두를 지키고 있고, 하루에 수천만건의 대화를 연결시켜 주고 있습니다. 틴더와 같은 유명한 데이팅 서비스들을 다수 보유하고 있는 매치그룹에 하이퍼커넥트가 인수된 이후에도 아자르의 Video Chat이 가지고 있는 전세계의 시장의 유저들과 창출하는 수익은 여전히 중요하게 여겨지고 있습니다.

아자르 매칭개발팀에서는 초당 몇백건씩 들어오는 유저들의 요청을 받아 빠르게 대화할 상대방을 논리적으로 결정하는 Match Making을 담당하고 있습니다. 유저의 직접적인 선호와 국가와 언어와 같은 간접적인 Context 를 모두 고려해 유저들에게 좋은 경험을 진행할 수 있는 상대방을 정해주면서도, 동시에 적절한 성능 튜닝을 통해 유저가 기다리는 대기시간을 최소화해야 한다는 까다로운 문제를 풀어나가고 있습니다.

현재 매칭 개발팀에서는 이러한 문제를 풀기 위해 분산 스트리밍 데이터 처리 엔진인 flink를 메인으로 사용하고 있습니다. flink를 통해 실시간으로 들어오는 사용자들의 요청들을 event-driven 방식으로 처리하고, 트래픽에 따라 유연하게 어플리케이션을 확장할 수 있게 하며, 분산 처리의 핵심인 로드 밸런싱을 쉽게 커스터마이징 하고 있습니다. 또한 flink 는 stateful streaming 을 지원하기 때문에 사용자의 컨텍스트를 flink state 로 저장하여 낮은 latency 를 유지하면서도 Match Making 알고리즘 성능을 개선시킬 수 있었습니다.

대부분의 일들은 뛰어난 동료들을 자랑하는 다른 팀들과의 협업으로 진행됩니다. AWS 기반 Kubernetes 환경에서의 배포와 인프라 관리를 DevOps팀의 도움을 받아 진행하고 있고, WebRTC 통신이나 ML Model을 전문적으로 연구하는 개발팀들과도 긴밀하게 일하게 됩니다. 이러한 체계적인 개발 환경에서 팀의 고유 개발 영역과 그 목표를 달성하는 것에 집중하려고 하고 있습니다.

아자르는 글로벌 서비스로 대부분의 유저들이 한국이 아닌 글로벌 유저들입니다. 이러한 서비스 특성상 다양한 국가의 유저들의 언어, 특수한 문화, 법률, 특성과 같은 평소에 접하기 힘든 부분을 고려한 기획을 접할 수 있고, 이러한 요구사항을 유연하게 다루기 위한 설계 역시 필수적입니다. 글로벌 서비스에서 보편적이면서도 지역적 특색을 살려 비지니스 효과를 높이는 프로젝트들을 접할 수 있습니다.

Azar Backend 기술블로그 살펴보기(Link)

additionalPlain: 하이퍼커넥트가 채용하는 포지션에 지원하는 경우, 개인정보 처리에 관하여서는 본 개인정보처리방침이 적용됩니다: https://career.hyperconnect.com/privacy
additional: 하이퍼커넥트가 채용하는 포지션에 지원하는 경우, 개인정보 처리에 관하여서는 본 개인정보처리방침이 적용됩니다: https://career.hyperconnect.com/privacy
descriptionPlain:
[Azar Planning Team 소개]

아자르 플래닝 팀은 아자르의 지속 성장을 위한 전략을 구체화 하여 실행하는 조직입니다. 플래닝 매니저로서 Head of Azar와 직접 소통하고 성장 전략을 고민하며 글로벌 마케팅 팀 및 개발팀 등 다양한 조직내 이해관계자들과의 협업을 통해 비즈니스의 성장에 발판을 만들 수 있는 다양한 업무를 수행합니다.

1. Azar Business Planning Team의 Business Planning Manager는,
- 아자르의 성장을 도모하기 위해 다양한 전략적 업무를 수행하는 스튜디오 차원의 팀으로서, 제품에 대한 핵심 의사결정을 신속하면서도 논리적으로 내릴 수 있도록 지원 및 조언을 제공합니다.
- 플래닝 매니저는 시장의 외적 환경을 빠르게 파악하고 숨어있는 기회 혹은 예상되는 문제를 사전에 발견하여 아자르의 지속적인 성장을 주도합니다.
- 글로벌 서비스를 경험할 수 있습니다. 다양한 국적과 백그라운드의 유저를 보유한 아자르의 시장별 전략을 찾는것부터 전세계 다양한 포트폴리오를 가진 매치그룹의 인사이트를 활용하고 우리의 인사이트를 역으로 제공하는 업무까지 담당하게 됩니다.
- 플래닝 매니저는 모회사인 Match Group 내 다양한 이해관계자들과 글로벌한 환경에서 구조적인 사고를 바탕으로 소통 및 리포팅도 담당합니다.
- 본인의 업무에 대한 오너십을 가지고 빠른 성장을 할 수 있습니다.

2. Business Planning Manager의 일하는 방식
- 주요 지역의 KPI 설정에 직접 참여하고 관리합니다.
- 구조적인 사고를 기반으로 조직 내/외부의 이해관계자들과 성장전략을 도출하여 성과를 개선합니다.
- 청자의 입장에서 생각하며 논리적 생각을 바탕으로 다양한 리포팅 업무를 주도합니다.
- 주도적으로 다양한 지표를 관리하며 문제점을 선제적으로 발견하고 원인을 파악하여 해결방안을 제시합니다.
description:
[Azar Planning Team 소개]

아자르 플래닝 팀은 아자르의 지속 성장을 위한 전략을 구체화 하여 실행하는 조직입니다. 플래닝 매니저로서 Head of Azar와 직접 소통하고 성장 전략을 고민하며 글로벌 마케팅 팀 및 개발팀 등 다양한 조직내 이해관계자들과의 협업을 통해 비즈니스의 성장에 발판을 만들 수 있는 다양한 업무를 수행합니다.

- 주도적으로 다양한 지표를 관리하며 문제점을 선제적으로 발견하고 원인을 파악하여 해결방안을 제시합니다.

lists.content:
• Head of Azar의 Thought Partner로써 아자르의 단/중/장기적 전략 수립에 직접 참여
  • 아자르의 지속 성장을 위한 핵심성과지표 세팅 및 모니터링
  • 모회사인 Match Group 리포팅 업무 (Routine/Ad hoc)
  • 사내 및 대외 커뮤니케이션을 위한 지원제공 및 실행
  • 유저 및 프로덕트에 대한 인사이트 도출을 통해 다양한 협업을 진행하여 프로덕트 및 마케팅 효율 개선

• 5년 이상 유관경력을 보유하신 분
  • 영어와 한국어 모두 뛰어난 Verbal & Written 커뮤니케이션 스킬이 있는 분
  • Data 기반으로 문제를 해결하는 Analytic Mindset을 보유하고 계신 분
  • 내/외부의 다양한 이해관계자들과의 협업 역량을 보유하신 분
  • 스스로 목표를 설정하고 능동적 · 주도적으로 끝까지 달성해내는 실행력을 가지신 분

• IT 기업 PM/PO/전략/기획 경험 3년 이상 있으신 분
  • Data 분석 및 SQL 쿼리 능력을 보유하신 분
  • 영문으로 다양한 리포팅 경험이 있으신 분
  • 최신 데이팅/라이브 스트리밍/엔터테인먼트 시장과 모바일 앱 시장 트렌드에 관심이 높은 분

• 정의되지 않은 과제 전반을 주도적으로 정의하고 해결할 뿐만 아니라 팀 목표에 맞는 프로젝트를 직접 제안하고 전문 분야 측면에서 리드합니다.
  • 다른 기능의 팀들과 협업하여 프로젝트를 리딩하여 팀의 영향력을 팀 너머로 확장합니다.
  • 여러 직군의 이해관계자와 전문성을 바탕으로 질의응답과 상호작용하며 정기적으로 프레젠테이션도 수행합니다.
  • 팀 간의 협업 과정을 조정하고 결과물을 만들 수 있도록 지원합니다.
  • 평소 다양한 유관부서와 업무적 관계를 구축하여 책임감 있게 프로젝트 결과물을 만들어 냅니다.
  • 여러 팀을 통해 다양한 정보를 수집하여 결과물을 개선해냅니다.
  • 여러 직군의 이해당사자들과 협력하여 놓치기 쉬운, 분야 별 사각지대의 위치한 문제를 찾아 명확하게 정의해내고 해결합니다.

• 고용 형태: 정규직
  • 채용 절차: 서류전형 > 1차 면접 > 2차 면접 > 3차면접(해당 시) > 최종 합격
  • 근무 시간: 근무시간을 자율적으로 선택하는DIY(Do It Yourself) 근무제
  • 지원 서류: 자유 양식의 상세 경력기반 국문 또는 영문이력서(PDF)
  • 서류전형결과안내는 2월부터 진행

• 하이퍼커넥트는 증명사진, 주민등록번호, 가족관계, 혼인여부 등 채용과 관계없는 개인정보를 요구하지 않습니다.
  • 수습기간 중 급여 등 처우에 차등이 없습니다.
  • 제출해 주신 내용 중 허위 사실이 있을 경우 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 사전에 안내된 채용 절차 외에도 추가 면접 전형이 진행될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 지원자의 동의 하에 평판조회 절차가 진행될 수 있으며, 평판조회 결과에 따라 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.
  • 병역특례요원의 경우, 병역특례 관련법에 따라 복무관리를 진행합니다.

descriptionBodyPlain:
[Azar Planning Team 소개]

아자르 플래닝 팀은 아자르의 지속 성장을 위한 전략을 구체화 하여 실행하는 조직입니다. 플래닝 매니저로서 Head of Azar와 직접 소통하고 성장 전략을 고민하며 글로벌 마케팅 팀 및 개발팀 등 다양한 조직내 이해관계자들과의 협업을 통해 비즈니스의 성장에 발판을 만들 수 있는 다양한 업무를 수행합니다.

1. Azar Business Planning Team의 Business Planning Manager는,
- 아자르의 성장을 도모하기 위해 다양한 전략적 업무를 수행하는 스튜디오 차원의 팀으로서, 제품에 대한 핵심 의사결정을 신속하면서도 논리적으로 내릴 수 있도록 지원 및 조언을 제공합니다.
- 플래닝 매니저는 시장의 외적 환경을 빠르게 파악하고 숨어있는 기회 혹은 예상되는 문제를 사전에 발견하여 아자르의 지속적인 성장을 주도합니다.
- 글로벌 서비스를 경험할 수 있습니다. 다양한 국적과 백그라운드의 유저를 보유한 아자르의 시장별 전략을 찾는것부터 전세계 다양한 포트폴리오를 가진 매치그룹의 인사이트를 활용하고 우리의 인사이트를 역으로 제공하는 업무까지 담당하게 됩니다.
- 플래닝 매니저는 모회사인 Match Group 내 다양한 이해관계자들과 글로벌한 환경에서 구조적인 사고를 바탕으로 소통 및 리포팅도 담당합니다.
- 본인의 업무에 대한 오너십을 가지고 빠른 성장을 할 수 있습니다.

2. Business Planning Manager의 일하는 방식
- 주요 지역의 KPI 설정에 직접 참여하고 관리합니다.
- 구조적인 사고를 기반으로 조직 내/외부의 이해관계자들과 성장전략을 도출하여 성과를 개선합니다.
- 청자의 입장에서 생각하며 논리적 생각을 바탕으로 다양한 리포팅 업무를 주도합니다.
- 주도적으로 다양한 지표를 관리하며 문제점을 선제적으로 발견하고 원인을 파악하여 해결방안을 제시합니다.

additionalPlain:
As part of our team, you’ll enjoy:
 
-- Working on a product that has an immediate impact on people’s lives all around the world
-- 12 child care days per child, as well as days off for their graduation and admission interviews 
-- Additional paid days off for weddings, anniversaries, pet checkups, and birthdays 
-- Full reimbursement of commuting costs up to (up to 100,000 yen/month) and housing assistance for full-time employees 
-- Relocation assistance for families with preschool age children who need to be closer to school for enrollment 
-- Other perks include gifts for birthdays, weddings, and maternity leave
-- Professional Development stipend and No Meeting Wednesdays 
-- The opportunity to join six active Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)
 
 
チームの一員として、以下の特典や福利厚生が得られます。
 
--  世界中の人々の生活にダイレクトに影響を与えるプロダクトに携わることができる
--  お子さん1人につき、1年で12日間の看護休暇を取得可能
--  入園・入学・卒園・卒業時に休暇を取得可能
--  結婚・結婚記念日・ペットの診療日・誕生日といった機会に休暇を取得可能
--  交通費を全額支給（上限：100,000円/月）
--  家賃補助制度あり
--  待機児童対策のため、保育園に入りやすい地域に引っ越しをする場合に、引っ越し金援助あり
--  誕生日・結婚・出産のプレゼント
--  自己研鑚費用支給（1万円/月）
--  水曜日には一切ミーティングなし
--  6つのERG (マイノリティ従業員を尊重するグループ)に属することができる
      --Black at Tinder (BET)
      --Desis at Tinder (DAT)
      --East Asians at Tinder (EAT)
      --Latinx at Tinder (LAT)
      --Pride at Tinder (PAT)
      --Women at Tinder (WAT)

descriptionPlain:
Tinder, the most popular dating app in the world, is searching for a dynamic communications leader to join our remarkable team. Tinder has always been driven by youth culture, and today, Tinder is used mainly by Gen Z. This group continues to influence society and challenge constrictive norms in the most profound ways. No other generation has significantly impacted the workplace, retail consumption, technology, politics, and culture in the same way. It is this generation that we believe are driving the most change that we’ve ever seen in how we date, who we date and what dating is. Read more about how young people use Tinder today in “A Renaissance in Dating, Driven by Authenticity”, the second Future of Dating Report from Tinder driven by our Communications team.

There’s never been a more exciting time to work at Tinder! We’re doing something meaningful—helping people find their people. And talking about people – Authenticity and Inclusion are hardwired here at Tinder. You’ll find opportunities to bring your light and create some best work of your life moments. You’ll be proud of the experiences you help create for humans all over the world. We are on a course to revolutionize how young adults meet and connect today; if you want to be a part of that… keep reading.

This is an exciting opportunity to mold, protect, and energetically share the compelling story of Tinder - as a progressive company, an innovative product, and a pop-cultural brand. The ideal candidate is a self-motivated individual with a profound understanding of the fast-changing media landscape in Japan (experience in Korea/ East Asia comms would be a plus) with an interest in swift decision-making, expert issues management, and spur-of-the-moment creativity.

As a generalist role, this role encompasses brand reputation driving strategy (consumer-focused comms), product communications (new features, innovation, and trust & safety) and corporate communications (crisis, reputation management and executive positioning). If you're known for your practical (read: level-headed), willing to take action approach, and creative brilliance, then this is the dream job you've been waiting for!

The Communications Director will report directly to the VP of Communications, APAC, and operate from our Tokyo office in a hybrid work environment which will require in office partnership 3x a week. This is not a remote role and requires fluency in English and native reading, writing and speaking skills in Japanese including a really deep and insightful grasp of the Japanese press and both traditional and new media landscape.

lists.text: As the Director of Communications, your scope will include:
lists.content:
• Orchestrating and leading Japan and Korea/ East Asia communications strategies related to product and company narratives, as well as new product features , pr events and updates
  • Collaborating with cross functional partners within Match Group and Tinder to promote trust, safety, and inclusivity narratives.
  • Partner with regional teams to build impactful global campaigns and brand narratives
  • Devising and implementing a streamlined, concise, and creative local executive communications strategy
  • Directly engaging with media and external partners regularly and consistently to deepen relations and build impactful exposure and understanding for the brand
  • Crafting product-specific messaging and collaborating closely with product marketing, and safety teams.
  • Managing the country budget efficiently and smartly to the benefit of the brand goals
  • Being the spokesperson for ongoing storytelling in the markets
  • Supervising agency resources and planning - balancing critical thinking and work at your end and using agencies effectively for implementation

• While we understand that not every candidate will “tick all the boxes”, we believe our perfect match will resonate with our Tinder Values:

    • One Team, One Dream
  • You're a champion of simplicity, keeping communications clear and uncluttered while being resourceful enough to achieve significant results.
  • Your optimism is infectious, and your ego never gets in the way of the big picture - you operate with humility.
  • You understand that communications as a profession is changing and want to be a part of that change.
  • You’re ready to explore new ways of breaking the routine. And bring ideas to the table
  • You bring 10+ years of experience in the communications field, either in a corporate or agency environment.
    • Spark Solutions
  • You've worked with partners and executives, helping to crystalize their vision and express their unique points of view.
  • You appreciate a nimble and flexible environment, where being a Director means you’re a leader in charge and can advance high-impact work quickly
    • Own it
  • You're a pro at taking global storytelling into the local market and can work with cross-functional teams to bring collaborative projects to life
  • You consider yourself a hands-on leader with a strong network of relationships with journalists across many verticals.
  • You’re not afraid and actually like to pick up the phone on an incoming note from a reporter, good or bad.
    • Embrace our Differences
  • You understand this is more of a generalist role oscillating between product, corporate, and trust & safety.
  • While your focus is on the East Asian markets, you are comfortable working across multiple time zones.
  • You show up as an expert and someone to look up and learn from within the Global comms team and the local market teams
    • Never Stop Learning
  • You possess the ability to devise and implement communications campaigns and can develop and expand capable of developing and expanding ambitious strategies
  • You listen and respond to feedback and demonstrate clearly that you can introspect and evolve.

Commitment to Inclusion
At Tinder, we don’t just accept difference, we celebrate it. We strive to build a workplace that reflects the rich diversity of our members around the world, and we value unique perspectives and backgrounds. Even if you don’t meet all the listed qualifications, we invite you to apply and show us how your skills could transfer. Tinder is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace where we welcome people of all sexes, gender identities, races, ethnicities, disabilities, and other lived experiences. Learn more here: https://www.lifeattinder.com/dei

descriptionPlain:
The Team and Role
We are looking for a talented intern to help us support Tinder communications in France and Benelux. This is a 6 months placement due to start as soon as possible. The candidate who will join us must be a dynamic communications intern with a good understanding of the media and social media ecosystem, and a background in public relations and communications (Corporate and Consumer).
This person should have a passion for the Tinder brand and must be a self-starter with the ability to manage several projects at once with a high level of detail. Of particular interest are candidates with experience working in France, in addition to a passion for technology, entertainment or lifestyle sectors. Also of interest are candidates who have knowledge of developing communications tactics for a young, consumer-focused brand. 
The candidate will be a member of a seasoned group of professionals helping to shape and tell the story of Tinder as a company, product and brand. The candidate will report to the Director of Communications in France. 
The successful candidate will be responsible for working hand-in-hand with our Director of Communications, our PR agency in France and Netherlands and executing campaigns in partnership with the Marketing team, the EMEA Communications team and the Global Communications team based in LA. The role requires strong cross-functional interactions with teams based across Europe and in the US. 

Where you’ll work:
This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. This position is located in Paris, France.

lists.content:
• Be the voice of our audience
  • Assist the Tinder Communications team in France and Netherlands with planning, execution and analysis of  campaigns 
  • Bring your own ideas to the table and bring them to life 
  • Research and monitor trends within dating, app marketing and Gen Z culture and how this could enhance our communication strategy
  • Work on a personal project throughout the internship, and present your unique ideas and perspective on Tinder to senior leadership
  • Communicate with Tinder’s agencies and Tinder employees across the world
  • General admin work supporting the team

descriptionPlain:
Our Mission

As humans, there are few things more exciting than meeting someone new. At Tinder, we’re inspired by the challenge of keeping the magic of human connection alive. With tens of millions of users, hundreds of millions of downloads, 2+ billion swipes per day, 20+ million matches per day, and a presence in 190+ countries, our reach is expansive—and rapidly growing.
 
We work together to solve complex problems. Behind the simplicity of every match, we think deeply about human relationships, behavioral science, network economics, AI and ML, online and real-world safety, cultural nuances, loneliness, love, sex, and more.

The Team

There are internships and then there's the Tindership program. Forget boring busywork—spend your summer as part of our team, making a real impact on our business. Tinder interns gain a meaningful experience connecting with their mentor and managers, participating in large-scale projects, and collaborating with other interns in our flagship Tindership hackathon. You’ll join an inclusive workplace and gain real-world experiences and exposure to Tinder's culture. 

Where you’ll work

This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. The position will be located in Los Angeles, CA.

This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. The position will be located in Los Angeles, CA.

lists.content:
• Research and monitor trends within dating, tech, marketing and Gen Z culture
  • Work on a personal project throughout the year, presenting your unique ideas and perspective on Tinder to senior leadership. 
  • Someone actively on social media, understands tools, trends and is able to contribute to brainstorms with tactical ideas through the lens of social media engagement.  
  • Assist the Tinder Comms team with planning, execution and analysis of media and communication strategies
  • Participate in meetings across Marketing, Comms, Social, Business and Product in order to learn about the different career paths available within Tinder
  • Prepare presentations and review documents on special projects that drive the communications narrative in the U.S.

• 3rd/4th year undergraduate student with experience in or a strong interest in launching a career in communications with a graduation date no earlier than December 2024
  • Someone who is obsessed with new communications trends. Help us unearth the best way to present information about our gen z members to the press.
  •  A deep understanding and obsession of American youth culture. You saw the meme before any of us did and that makes you cooler than us. 
  • A deliberate writer with insatiable curiosity. You ask how else we could tell this story and aren’t afraid to let your creativity shine. 
  • Familiarity with Google Docs, Slides & Sheets and the ability to navigate between them with ease. 
  • Highly organized with proven administrative skills and a high attention to detail
  • Hardworking and enthusiastic
  • Ability to learn quickly but isn’t afraid to ask questions
  • Good team player with ability to form excellent working relationships at all levels
  • Someone who is outgoing and personable, with excellent communication skills

lists.text: As part of our team, you'll enjoy:
lists.content:
• The liveliness of a startup with the impact of a global business
  • Collaborating with a team of creative, fun and driven colleagues 
  • Working with an extraordinary team of smart, creative, fun, and highly motivated people
  • Competitive hourly pay and flexible working schedule
  • Comprehensive health coverage, 401(k) 
  • Access to mental health resources
  • Virtual yoga and fitness classes, and many other fun activities
  • Virtual celebrations, parties, socials, and more
  • A robust Learning + Development offering including our MentorMatch program, access to a library of 6,000+ online learning courses through Udemy
  • Fully customized computer equipment to fit your needs
  • The opportunity to join 8+ active Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)

Our Mission

descriptionPlain:
At Match Group (NASDAQ: MTCH), millions of members use our products every month and our customers go on tens of thousands of dates every single day. Our reach and impact are staggering. We believe that no business brings more happiness to more people than ours; we can never forget the impact we have on society and most importantly, our community members.

"Pairs" is an online dating app used by more than 20 million people in Japan. Since launch, we have received success stories from over 700,000 people. Pairs is the first-in-market to offer 24/7 in-house customer service, including text and image monitoring, so our users' safety and security are always ensured.

We created Pairs to help singles discover new and interesting ways to find a life partner. In the United States, more than 1 in 3 couples met their partner online. In Japan more than 70 per cent of singles claim to have no partner. As the number 1 online dating service in Japan, we're working hard every day to help singles find their true love. Since the release of Pairs in October 2012, we have helped to create opportunities for many users to find partnership and marriage. Pairs offers the opportunity to find an ideal partner that matches one's own values through various search features and a well-developed MyTag. Everyday, we receive many reports of successful matches from across Japan and from overseas. It is our hope that more and more opportunities for wonderful relationships will be created, which inspires us to improve our service every day.

Pairs is looking for a talented communications manager with a strong understanding of the media ecosystem in Japan and is adept at managing comprehensive communications strategies and tactics in the market. In addition, a deep understanding of what it means to be in youth culture is important. The candidate will be a member of the policy and comms team of professionals helping to shape and tell the story of Pairs as product, service and brand. It is also about being creative in how we tell our story, including the use of social media, as we work with the public policy team to develop campaigns that make a positive impact.

It is also about being creative in how we tell our story, including the use of social media, as we work with the public policy team to develop campaigns that make a positive impact.

lists.content:
• Leading overall Japan external communications strategy, demonstrating the ability to drive planning and ensure flawless execution consistently
  • Establishing Pair’s brand and profile with the media
  • Shaping the climate of opinion with key third party stakeholders through smart, strategic communications
  • Working to tell our story in creative, inspiring ways that resonate with journalists and on social media
  • Being an active spokesperson and advocate for Pairs
  • Evangelizing to provide a life-changing service that people will remember with great fondness, and how Japan could benefit from new technologies
  • Building relationships with senior leaders throughout the organization and advising them on strategic narratives across business, brand, employee and crisis communications, with a clear sense of urgency and impressive interpersonal skills
  • Shaping our corporate voice, and promoting our organizational culture, in a truly locally relevant way
  • Partnering with multi agencies to build communications strategies, and campaigns, that promote and enhance the overall reputation of Pairs
  • Highly organized with ability to manage multiple complex and high impact projects concurrently
  • Managing resources for maximum efficiency, including a retainer agency to amplify your efforts

• 6+ years proven experience in media, corporate, or agency settings
  • Excellent written and spoken communication skills in English and Japanese
  • Experience working in a fast-growing tech company
  • Experience working with policy and marketing on coordinate campaigns
  • presentation skills
• Photo and video-editing skills is a big plus

• Embodies and promotes the values of Eureka
  • A strong communicator comfortable at ease both in the front lines and in the boardroom
  • Ability to keep cool under pressure and deal with ambiguity
  • Willingness to roll up your sleeves and help build a new, high-performing organization within Eureka
  • A positive can-do attitude

additionalPlain:
#LI-CENTRAL

#LI-CH1


Why Match Group?

Our mission is simple – to help people find love and happiness! We love our employees too and understand the importance of all life's milestones.  Here are some of the benefits we are proud to offer: 

Mind & Body – Medical, mental health, and wellness benefits to support your overall health and well-being
Financial Wellness – Competitive compensation, 100% employer match on 401k contributions up to 10% (cap at $10,000), as well as an employee stock purchase program to help you feel supported in your financial security
Unplug – Generous PTO and 18 paid holidays so you can unplug
Career – Annual training allowance for professional development and ERG membership opportunities and events so you feel connected and empowered in your work
Family – Families come in all shapes and sizes so we offer 20 weeks of 100% paid parental leave, fertility, adoption, and child care resources, as well as pet insurance and discounts  
Company Gatherings – We host fun happy hours and company events where our employees get to know each other 	and build a sense of connection and belonging!

We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer and we value the rich dynamics that diversity brings to our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, creed, national origin, ancestry, disability, marital status, age, sexual orientation, sex (including pregnancy and sexual harassment), gender identity or expression, uniformed service or veteran status, genetic information, or any other legally protected characteristic.  Period. 

If you require reasonable accommodation to complete a job application, pre-employment testing, or a job interview or to otherwise participate in the hiring process, please contact employeebenefits@matchgroup.com.
