You will be empowered to take initiative on end-to-end design projects, including getting alignment on design objectives and priorities with key stakeholders. You will join a close-knit group of designers and work closely with Research, Product Managers, Data Science, Business Intelligence, and Engineering to craft innovative experiences combined with best-in-class practices in this space. 

When it comes to dating, the connection starts online, but the real magic happens once you meet in real life (IRL).  We think the same is true for creating the best platforms, so we work together IRL in our LA or NYC offices 3 days/week.

lists.content:
• Rapidly iterate and refine design concepts－from initial briefing through final delivery.
  • Work collaboratively with cross-functional partners to identify key design hypotheses and prioritize projects in the short and long term.
  • Communicate design decisions in compelling and creative ways; bridge alignment across teams through high-fidelity prototypes and live presentations to cross-functional partners.
  • Test, learn, and iterate on everything you do alongside your product and research peers.
  • Be comfortable exploring the unknown using fresh and unique approaches to design problems.

• 3+ years of product design, UI/UX design, visual design, or equivalent experience, including 2-3 years in a consumer-facing product design role in the mobile space.
  • Bonus points if you have basic front end development skills
  • Portfolio that demonstrates evidence of launching software at scale in a fast-paced product organization across multiple markets.
  • You are highly motivated to learn new things about complex technology, cultural and demographic nuances, and their impact on various user experiences.
  • Ability to work independently to explore concepts from beginning to end, yet also crave healthy feedback loops with your ideas.
  • Deep organization and execution skills, especially in collaboration with multiple stakeholders, articulating high-level team goals and connecting your work to larger team or company initiatives.
  • A high-level of craftsmanship when it comes to UI.
  • Outstanding attention to detail with a proven track record of working within and contributing to a design system.
  • Experience working with consumer research and data.
  • Proficient in Figma, including high-fidelity prototyping and component libraries.
  • Passionate and curious about how design can be leveraged to improve users’ ability to find and maintain romantic connections.

• We’re a small, nimble team that iterates fast to bring new dating products to our users. More startup vibe than big company
  • We're constantly trying to reimagine human connection by embracing new technologies, anticipating changes in the global digital zeitgeist, and unlocking new and exciting ways to bring people together

salaryDescription: Factors such as scope and responsibilities of the position, candidate's work experience, education/training, job-related skills, internal peer equity, as well as market and business considerations may influence base pay offered. This salary range is reflective of a position based in New York City. This salary will be subject to a geographic adjustment (according to a specific city and state), if an authorization is granted to work outside of the location listed in this posting.

descriptionPlain:
Azar Product Design Team 소개

Azar의 Product Design Team은 사용자 인터페이스(UI)와 사용자 경험(UX)를 전문적으로 담당하며, 아자르 제품의 디자인 및 사용자에게 최적화된 경험을 제공하기 위해 끊임없이 노력합니다.
Graphic Design Unit 역시 아자르 제품에 요구되는 모든 그래픽 요소를 책임지며 창의적인 아이디어를 구현합니다.
이러한 두 팀은 아자르 제품의 디자인과 구조를 지속적으로 향상시키기 위해 열정적으로 협력하며, 각자의 전문성과 창의력, 센스를 발휘하여 회사의 발전에 기여하고 있습니다.


Responsibilities

Azar의 Product Design Team은 사용자 경험과 비즈니스 영향을 고려한 프로젝트 화면 설계 및 시각화를 담당하고, 사용자 경험에 대한 판단과 의사결정을 도와주는 역할을 수행합니다.
   ◾ UX Flow 설계 - Wireframe 및 Prototype을 통해 사용성과 비즈니스 임팩트를 검증
   ◾ Design System 제작과 관리
   ◾ Design QA - App/Web Design 리서치
   ◾ 사용자 중심, 관점에서의 디자인
   ◾ 사용자 관점에서 모든 ongoing 프로젝트들에 대한 피드
description:
Azar Product Design Team 소개

Azar의 Product Design Team은 사용자 인터페이스(UI)와 사용자 경험(UX)를 전문적으로 담당하며, 아자르 제품의 디자인 및 사용자에게 최적화된 경험을 제공하기 위해 끊임없이 노력합니다.
Graphic Design Unit 역시 아자르 제품에 요구되는 모든 그래픽 요소를 책임지며 창의적인 아이디어를 구현합니다.
이러한 두 팀은 아자르 제품의 디자인과 구조를 지속적으로 향상시키기 위해 열정적으로 협력하며, 각자의 전문성과 창의력, 센스를 발휘하여 회사의 발전에 기여하고 있습니다.


Responsibilities

Azar의 Product Design Team은 사용자 경험과 비즈니스 영향을 고려한 프로젝트 화면 설계 및 시각화를 담당하고, 사용자 경험에 대한 판단과 의사결정을 도와주는 역할을 수행합니다.
◾ UX Flow 설계 - Wireframe 및 Prototype을 통해 사용성과 비즈니스 임팩트를 검증
◾ Design System 제작과 관리
◾ Design QA - App/Web Design 리서치
◾ 사용자 중심, 관점에서의 디자인
◾ 사용자 관점에서 모든 ongoing 프로젝트들에 대한 피드

lists.content:
• 서비스 로드맵과 프로젝트 목표를 이해하고 제품의 사용자 중심 경험을 설계할 수 있는 능력
  • 논리적 사고에 기반한 원활한 커뮤니케이션 능력
  • 타겟 마켓과 시장의 트랜드를 이해하고 제품에 인사이트를 줄 수 있는 능력
  • Match Group 및 협업 조직과 논의를 위한 영어 커뮤니케이션 능력
  • 해외시장 타겟한 프로덕트 UIUX design 경험 (preferred)

• 불확실한 과제를 주도적으로 정의하고 해결하며, 팀 목표에 부합한 프로젝트를 직접 제안하고 전문 분야에서 리더십을 발휘합니다.
  • 다양한 기능을 가진 팀과 협력하여 프로젝트를 이끌어, 팀의 영향력을 넘어서 확장시킵니다.
  • 여러 직군의 이해관계자와 전문지식을 바탕으로 소통하고 상호 작용할 수 있는 능력을 발휘하며, 정기적으로 프레젠테이션 역량을 갖춥니다.
  • 팀 간 협업 과정을 조정하고 결과물을 창출할 수 있도록 지원합니다. 여러 유관 부서와 적극적인 업무 협력을 통해 책임감있게 프로젝트 성과를 이룹니다.
  • 팀 내 동료들의 성장을 적극 지원하며 건강한 조직 문화를 선도적으로 형성합니다.
  • 이렇게 함으로써, 팀 전체가 효과적으로 움직이며 개개인의 성장과 조직의 발전을 도모하고, 성공적인 프로젝트 결과를 창출할 수 있는 역동적인 환경을 만들어냅니다.

• 고용 형태: 정규직
  • 채용 절차: 서류전형 > 1차 면접 > 2차 면접 > 3차면접(해당 시) > 최종합격
  • 근무 시간: 근무시간을 자율적으로 선택하는DIY(Do It Yourself) 근무제
  • 지원 서류: 자유 양식의 상세 경력기반 국문 또는 영문이력서(PDF) & 포트폴리오(필수)

• 하이퍼커넥트는 증명사진, 주민등록번호, 가족관계, 혼인여부 등 채용과 관계없는 개인정보를 요구하지 않습니다.
  • 수습기간 중 급여 등 처우에 차등이 없습니다.
  • 제출해 주신 내용 중 허위 사실이 있을 경우 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 사전에 안내된 채용 절차 외에도 추가 면접 전형이 진행될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 지원자의 동의 하에 평판조회 절차가 진행될 수 있으며, 평판조회 결과에 따라 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.

descriptionPlain:
[Hyperconnect Enterprise]
Enterprise 팀은 Hyperconnect의 축적된 기술력을 글로벌 비즈니스 서비스로 제공하여, 기술적 리더십을 확장하고 더 큰 시장에서 함께 성장해가는 것을 목표로 합니다. Azar, Hakuna 의 연속된 성공을 통해 가치가 입증된 핵심 기술을 국내외의 타사 서비스에 쉽고 빠르게 적용할 수 있도록 SDK 형태로 제공하고, 클라우드 서비스를 통해 운영과 최적화에 대한 노하우 및 도구를 제공합니다.

비디오, AI를 비롯한 기술적인 구성요소를 개별적으로 제공하는 것 뿐만 아니라, UI 요소를 포함한 user-facing 한 기능들을 다수 포함한 full-fledged 형식의 플랫폼을 제공함으로써 고객사가 최소한의 노력으로 완전한 기능을 제공할 수 있도록 합니다. 기술 연구소 및 사내 다른 프로덕트 스튜디오와 적극적으로 협업하고 있고 강력한 지원조직(사업, 마케팅, 운영)의 서포트를 받습니다.


[팀소개]
Enterprise Product Design 팀은 사용자 인터페이스(UI)와 사용자 경험(UX)을 전문적으로 담당합니다. 우리는 제품의 디자인과 사용자에게 최적화된 경험을 제공하기 위해 끊임없이 노력합니다. 또한, 우리는 B2B 서비스로 라이브 스트리밍 환경을 제공합니다. 고객과 사용자 중심의 디자인을 중요시하며, 다양한 브랜드를 포용하고 제품의 발전을 통해 보다 많은 사용자들이 라이브 스트리밍을 경험 할 수 있도록 노력을 아끼지 않고 있습니다.
description:
[Hyperconnect Enterprise]
Enterprise 팀은 Hyperconnect의 축적된 기술력을 글로벌 비즈니스 서비스로 제공하여, 기술적 리더십을 확장하고 더 큰 시장에서 함께 성장해가는 것을 목표로 합니다. Azar, Hakuna 의 연속된 성공을 통해 가치가 입증된 핵심 기술을 국내외의 타사 서비스에 쉽고 빠르게 적용할 수 있도록 SDK 형태로 제공하고, 클라우드 서비스를 통해 운영과 최적화에 대한 노하우 및 도구를 제공합니다.

비디오, AI를 비롯한 기술적인 구성요소를 개별적으로 제공하는 것 뿐만 아니라, UI 요소를 포함한 user-facing 한 기능들을 다수 포함한 full-fledged 형식의 플랫폼을 제공함으로써 고객사가 최소한의 노력으로 완전한 기능을 제공할 수 있도록 합니다. 기술 연구소 및 사내 다른 프로덕트 스튜디오와 적극적으로 협업하고 있고 강력한 지원조직(사업, 마케팅, 운영)의 서포트를 받습니다.


[팀소개]
Enterprise Product Design 팀은 사용자 인터페이스(UI)와 사용자 경험(UX)을 전문적으로 담당합니다. 우리는 제품의 디자인과 사용자에게 최적화된 경험을 제공하기 위해 끊임없이 노력합니다. 또한, 우리는 B2B 서비스로 라이브 스트리밍 환경을 제공합니다. 고객과 사용자 중심의 디자인을 중요시하며, 다양한 브랜드를 포용하고 제품의 발전을 통해 보다 많은 사용자들이 라이브 스트리밍을 경험 할 수 있도록 노력을 아끼지 않고 있습니다.

lists.content:
• UX Flow 설계 - Wireframe 및 Prototype을 통해 사용성과 비즈니스 임팩트를 검증
  • Design System을 통한 커스터마이즈 환경 구축과 관리
  • Design QA - App/ Web Design 리서치
  • 사용자 중심, 관점에서의 디자인
  • 사용자 관점 및 고객 편의성 차원에서 진행 중인 모든 프로젝트들에 대한 피드백

• 6~8년 App, Web 디자인 제작 경험을 보유하신 분
  • 서비스 로드맵과 프로젝트 목표를 이해하고 제품의 사용자 및 제공자 경험을 설계할 수 있는 능력
  • 검증을 기반한 논리적이고 원활한 커뮤니케이션 능력
  • 완성도 있는 프로젝트 결과물을 만들어 낼 수 있는 디자인 스킬과 피그마 툴 숙련자
  • 디자인 시스템 구축 및 구조 환경에서의 협업 경험

• B2B 환경 및 라이브 스트리밍 시장의 트랜드를 이해하고 제품에 인사이트를 줄 수 있는 능력
  • Match Group 및 협업 조직과 논의를 위한 영어 커뮤니케이션 능력

• 부여받은 과제를 주도적으로 정의하고 해결할 수 있고, 팀 목표에 적합한 아이디어 제안과 전문성을 바탕으로 완성도 있는 결과물을 만들어 낼 수 있어야 합니다.
  • 각 직군 담당자와 전문지식을 바탕으로 효과적으로 협력하고, 시너지를 낼 수 있어야 합니다.
  • 논리적인 접근과 협업 상대와 원활한 커뮤니케이션을 할 수 있는 스킬을 갖춥니다.
  • 팀 간 협업 과정을 조정하고 결과물을 창출할 수 있도록 지원합니다. 여러 유관 부서와 적극적인 업무 협력을 통해 책임감있게 프로젝트 성과를 이룹니다.
  • 팀 내 동료들과 교류를 통해 함께 성장 할 수 있는 건강한 조직 문화 형성에 동참할 수 있어야 합니다

• 고용 형태: 정규직
  • 채용 절차: 서류전형 > 1차 면접 > 2차 면접 > 3차면접(해당 시) > 최종합격
  • 근무 시간: 근무시간을 자율적으로 선택하는DIY(Do It Yourself) 근무제
  • 지원 서류: 자유 양식의 상세 경력기반 국문 또는 영문이력서(PDF) & 포트폴리오(필수)

• 하이퍼커넥트는 증명사진, 주민등록번호, 가족관계, 혼인여부 등 채용과 관계없는 개인정보를 요구하지 않습니다.
  • 수습기간 중 급여 등 처우에 차등이 없습니다.
  • 제출해 주신 내용 중 허위 사실이 있을 경우 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 사전에 안내된 채용 절차 외에도 추가 면접 전형이 진행될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 지원자의 동의 하에 평판조회 절차가 진행될 수 있으며, 평판조회 결과에 따라 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.

additionalPlain:
What we offer:
Operate in an international and multicultural environment
A gorgeous working environment in the heart of Paris, spacious and modern office, rooftop, close to transport and amenities
Many quality moments of sharing: office activities, summer party, team buildings
Enjoy work-life balance
Edenred lunch voucher
Classpass gym discounts
Use our products free of charge

Tech environment:
Learn through e-learning, conferences, Meetups and sharing sessions
Agile, collaborative, stimulating and dynamic work environment
Microservice architecture in constant evolution
Tech Culture: crafts, autonomy and knowledge sharing
Express your creativity by participating in our hackathons
Work for a product with a high societal impact

Hiring process:
An initial Zoom conversation with Guillaume, Talent Acquisition Specialist (30 min)
A meeting with Julie Masson, Product Director (60 min).
A practical exercise with the squad (60 min)
A final interview with Gabrielle Gleysteen, Chief Product Officer, and Belinda Seauve, People Manager (60 min)

Upon your arrival, the People team and your new team will take care of organizing your first days.

Practical information:
Contract start: As soon as you are ready!
Location: 53 Rue de Châteaudun, Paris 75009
Work From Home Policy: Hybrid, between 2 and 3 days at the office per week required
Contract: CDI / Full Time

Meetic is an employer that respects equal opportunities and diversity.

descriptionPlain:
Meetic is the European leader in dating services operating across 21 countries. 
As the source of more than 8 million couples, Meetic works to create the best user experience whether online, mobile or at the many events organized every week across Europe.

A company focusing on a human philosophy, supported by the strength of an international group, our teams develop products with a strong social impact.
In recent years, Meetic has placed people and sustainability at the center of its focus through concrete actions: such as a green IT approach (reduction of servers, web eco-design, zero plastic...), friendly work environment, emergency leaves, WFH policy, work-life balance etc…

Take a look at our page: https://www.meetic-europe.com/

Join our product management team as a Product Manager, stepping into a pivotal role within a squad dedicated to achieving a key strategic objective for our company.

This is a unique opportunity to gain expertise in product management within a comprehensive and complex environment, where you'll quickly assume significant responsibilities and gain autonomy.

Your primary mission will be to craft the best possible user experience, aligned with the goals set for your squad, across all our platforms (web desktop, web mobile, iOS & Android applications, back-end).

Take a look at our page: https://www.meetic-europe.com/

Join our product management team as a Product Manager, stepping into a pivotal role within a squad dedicated to achieving a key strategic objective for our company.

This is a unique opportunity to gain expertise in product management within a comprehensive and complex environment, where you'll quickly assume significant responsibilities and gain autonomy.

Your primary mission will be to craft the best possible user experience, aligned with the goals set for your squad, across all our platforms (web desktop, web mobile, iOS & Android applications, back-end).

lists.content:
• Collaborate with the Product Director to develop your squad’s strategy, aligning it with the company's objectives.
  • Work closely with the Engineering Manager and Product Designer to translate objectives into feasible solutions, ensuring their effective implementation.
  • Translate functional evolution needs into detailed product specifications with your team.
  • Lead the product vision of an Agile squad 
  • Monitor project performance, communicate results to stakeholders, and propose necessary improvements.
  • Coordinate development efforts with other departments in the company (marketing, copywriting, analytics, etc.) to ensure project success.
  • Communicate effectively with the Product Director and other departments within the company regarding ongoing and upcoming projects, including objectives, timelines, and results.

• With a Bachelor's to Master's degree (Engineering or Business School), you have at least 3-5 years of experience in a similar role such as Product Owner/Manager.
  • You possess a good level of English, enabling regular communication with teams in the US.
  • Agile: You conceptualize and justify your team's iterations. You have a solid grasp of Agile development fundamentals.
  • Startup-minded: You can formulate hypotheses and validate them with minimal effort solutions. You balance effort and impact to optimize team achievements.
  • Organized: You deliver plans within timelines, adjusting priorities when necessary.
  • Persistent: You solve complex problems in a changing environment with interconnected challenges.
  • Detail-oriented: You navigate through issues with a keen eye for important details.
  • Data-driven: You substantiate arguments and persuade with quantitative and qualitative data using an objective model, KPIs, hypotheses, and trust.
  • Collaborative: Cross-functional work with design, R&D, and other product stakeholders is seamless for you; you integrate their constraints while knowing how to prioritize them.

descriptionPlain:
AI Platform Department
하이퍼커넥트는 사람과 사람 사이를 연결하는 서비스에서, 기존의 기술로는 접근하기 어렵지만 머신러닝 기술을 통해 풀 수 있는 문제들을 찾아내고 해결하여 사용자 경험을 혁신해왔습니다.  이런 혁신 안에서 AI Platform 실은 수년간 축적된 머신러닝 기술 경험을 플랫폼화하여, 하이퍼커넥트 및 매치 그룹 브랜드가 확장성 있게 기술 혜택을 받을 수 있게 하는 것을 목표합니다.  그런 노력이 플랫폼의 형태로 실현될 수 있도록 PM, Ops, Software engineer, ML engineer 분들이 모두 함께 일하고 있습니다. 

AI Production Team
AI Platform 실의 AI Production team은 플랫폼 제품 및 프로젝트를 기획 및 관리하며, 그 과정에 필요한 모든 운영 프로세스를 책임집니다.  조금 더 구체적으로 이야기하자면, AI 모델을 더 잘 개발할 수 있는 파이프라인을 만들거나, AI 모델을 서비스에 더 잘 활용할 수 있는 B2B 플랫폼 제품이나 프로젝트를 다룹니다.  저희 제품을 이용하면 AI 역량이 없거나 리소스가 부족한 조직에서도 API 나 SDK 를 통해 손쉽게 모델의 혜택을 얻을 수 있습니다.  조직구성원은 PM 과 오퍼레이션 담당자분들로 이루어져있어요.  AI Platform실의 제품과 프로젝트들이 보다 성공적으로 만들어지고 운영될 수 있도록 풀어야하는 문제들을 정의하고, 풀 수 있는 단위로 쪼개고, 개발 외의 blocker 들을 직접 해결해나가고 있습니다. 

저희 팀에 합류하신다면 다음의 재미를 누리실 수 있을 것 같아요.   
- AI 기술을 활용하여 글로벌 브랜드들이 가지고 있는 문제를 풀 수 있는 경험을 하실 수 있습니다.  
- 또한 그에 따라 더 넓은 범위의 유저들에게 임팩트를 미칠 수 있어요.  
- 팀 내 구성원뿐만 아니라 사내 및 매치 그룹 브랜드의 다양한 카운터파트와 함께 협업해볼 수 있습니다.

AI Production팀에 대해 인터뷰(Link)로 더 알아보기!

AI Production팀에 대해 인터뷰(Link)로 더 알아보기!

lists.content:
• Act as the primary point of contact between Hyperconnect and Match Group brands, ensuring effective communication, coordination and alignment of objectives.
  • Collaborate with Match Group brands to clarify problem statements and establish project goals, milestones, and deliverables.
  • Work closely with Hyperconnect's ML engineers and ML software engineers to ideate and implement the most effective AI solutions.
  • Manage project timelines, resources, and budgets to ensure timely delivery of high-quality AI-driven solutions.
  • Constantly monitor and analyze project progress, performance, and potential risks, and initiate necessary adjustments to ensure successful outcomes.
  • Foster a culture of innovation and cross-functional teamwork in the AI Production team.
  • Maintain up-to-date knowledge of AI industry trends, best practices, and technologies to ensure informed recommendations for project strategy and execution.

• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English, capable of leading business meetings and facilitating technical discussions with diverse audiences.
  • Strategic, analytical, communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
  • Demonstrated experience as a Project Manager, possessing strong management skills and a background in service planning.
  • Deep understanding of AI and ML concepts, technologies, and approaches.
  • Demonstrated experience in managing teams and cross-functional collaboration.
  • Highly organized, with a strong attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

• Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science or a related field.
  • 2+ years experience working on enterprise products, preferable in the AI domain.
  • Proficiency in data analysis and SQL queries.
  • Demonstrated experience in collaborating with global stakeholders.

• 고용 형태: 정규직
  • 채용 절차: 서류전형 > Recruiter Call > 1차 면접(발표 과제 포함) > 2차 면접 > 3차면접(해당 시) > 최종합격
  • 근무 시간: 근무시간을 자율적으로 선택하는DIY(Do It Yourself) 근무제
  • 지원 서류: 자유 양식의 상세 경력기반 국문 또는 영문이력서(PDF)

• 하이퍼커넥트는 증명사진, 주민등록번호, 가족관계, 혼인여부 등 채용과 관계없는 개인정보를 요구하지 않습니다.
  • 수습기간 중 급여 등 처우에 차등이 없습니다.
  • 제출해 주신 내용 중 허위 사실이 있을 경우 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 사전에 안내된 채용 절차 외에도 추가 면접 전형이 진행될 수 있습니다.
  • 필요 시 지원자의 동의 하에 평판조회 절차가 진행될 수 있으며, 평판조회 결과에 따라 채용이 취소될 수 있습니다.

additionalPlain:
Commitment to Inclusion

At Tinder, we don’t just accept difference, we celebrate it. We strive to build a workplace that reflects the rich diversity of our members around the world, and we value unique perspectives and backgrounds. Even if you don’t meet all the listed qualifications, we invite you to apply and show us how your skills could transfer. Tinder is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace where we welcome people of all sexes, gender identities, races, ethnicities, disabilities, and other lived experiences. Learn more here: https://www.lifeattinder.com/dei


If you require reasonable accommodation to complete a job application, pre-employment testing, or a job interview or to otherwise participate in the hiring process, please contact employeebenefits@matchgroup.com.

descriptionPlain:
Our Mission

As humans, there are few things more exciting than meeting someone new. At Tinder, we’re inspired by the challenge of keeping the magic of human connection alive. With tens of millions of users, hundreds of millions of downloads, 2+ billion swipes per day, 20+ million matches per day, and a presence in 190+ countries, our reach is expansive—and rapidly growing.
 
We work together to solve complex problems. Behind the simplicity of every match, we think deeply about human relationships, behavioral science, network economics, AI and ML, online and real-world safety, cultural nuances, loneliness, love, sex, and more.

The Team

There are internships and then there's the Tindership program. Forget boring busywork—spend your summer as part of our team, making a real impact on our business. Tinder interns gain a meaningful experience connecting with their mentor and managers, participating in large-scale projects, and collaborating with other interns in our flagship Tindership hackathon. You’ll join an inclusive workplace and gain real-world experiences and exposure to Tinder's culture.

About the Role

As the Product Manager Intern, you will get exposure to how product management teams at Tinder work towards creating rich consumer experiences. Our products empower people to express themselves, connect with our diverse community, and have fun together. This product manager will join an experienced team of product leaders within our product organization.

Where you'll work

This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. The position will be located in Los Angeles, CA.

Our Mission

As humans, there are few things more exciting than meeting someone new. At Tinder, we’re inspired by the challenge of keeping the magic of human connection alive. With tens of millions of users, hundreds of millions of downloads, 2+ billion swipes per day, 20+ million matches per day, and a presence in 190+ countries, our reach is expansive—and rapidly growing.
 
We work together to solve complex problems. Behind the simplicity of every match, we think deeply about human relationships, behavioral science, network economics, AI and ML, online and real-world safety, cultural nuances, loneliness, love, sex, and more.

The Team

There are internships and then there's the Tindership program. Forget boring busywork—spend your summer as part of our team, making a real impact on our business. Tinder interns gain a meaningful experience connecting with their mentor and managers, participating in large-scale projects, and collaborating with other interns in our flagship Tindership hackathon. You’ll join an inclusive workplace and gain real-world experiences and exposure to Tinder's culture.

About the Role

As the Product Manager Intern, you will get exposure to how product management teams at Tinder work towards creating rich consumer experiences. Our products empower people to express themselves, connect with our diverse community, and have fun together. This product manager will join an experienced team of product leaders within our product organization.

Where you'll work

This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. The position will be located in Los Angeles, CA.

lists.content:
• Understand Tinder’s strategic and competitive position and deliver world-class experiences to our audience
  • Leverage data analytics, A/B testing, qualitative user research, and predictive modeling to optimize KPIs, identify business opportunities, and shape the Revenue roadmap
  • Learn the dynamics of the Tinder community, understand the psychology of our users, and identify their in-product needs
  • You will clearly communicate your experiment roadmap, hypotheses and results, as appropriate, to a spectrum of audiences, from team members, PM peers and executives.
  • Drive innovation, definition, roadmap and design of A/B tests and product experiments to accelerate the growth of our active users and paid customers.

• A student currently enrolled in a full-time degree program pursuing an undergraduate or graduate degree with a graduation date no earlier than December 2024
  • Technical understanding of AI and ML models and curiosity about generative AI
  • Creativity to think of new and innovative ways to improve user experience
  • Ethical awareness to solution with sensitivity in a highly personal domain like dating
  • Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment.
  • Previous consumer experience with social products 
  • You enjoy working within an agile environment
  • Strong communication skills, verbal and written
  • You bring enthusiasm for solving interesting problems
  • You are a Self-starter, with a 'can-do' attitude in a dynamic environment
  • You have a strong analytical mind-set and are at your best working with KPIs
• You have previous product management or ML experience

lists.text: As part of our team, you’ll enjoy:
lists.content:
• The liveliness of a startup with the impact of a global business
  • Collaborating with a team of creative, fun and driven colleagues 
  • Working with an extraordinary team of smart, creative, fun, and highly motivated people
  • Competitive hourly pay and flexible working schedule
  • Comprehensive health coverage, 401(k) 
  • Access to mental health resources
  • Virtual yoga and fitness classes, and many other fun activities
  • Virtual celebrations, parties, socials, and more
  • A robust Learning + Development offering including our MentorMatch program, access to a library of 6,000+ online learning courses through Udemy
  • Fully customized computer equipment to fit your needs
  • The opportunity to join 8+ active Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)

salaryDescription: Factors such as scope and responsibilities of the position, candidate's work experience, education/training, job-related skills, internal peer equity, as well as market and business considerations may influence base pay offered. This salary range is reflective of a position based in Los Angeles. This salary will be subject to a geographic adjustment (according to a specific city and state), if an authorization is granted to work outside of the location listed in this posting.

We work together to solve complex problems. Behind the simplicity of every match, we think deeply about human relationships, behavioral science, network economics, AI and ML, online and real-world safety, cultural nuances, loneliness, love, sex, and more.
descriptionBody:
The Team

There are internships and then there's the Tindership program. Forget boring busywork—spend your summer as part of our team, making a real impact on our business. Tinder interns gain a meaningful experience connecting with their mentor and managers, participating in large-scale projects, and collaborating with other interns in our flagship Tindership hackathon. You’ll join an inclusive workplace and gain real-world experiences and exposure to Tinder's culture.

About the Role

As the Product Manager Intern, you will get exposure to how product management teams at Tinder work towards creating rich consumer experiences. Our products empower people to express themselves, connect with our diverse community, and have fun together. This product manager will join an experienced team of product leaders within our product organization.

Where you'll work

This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. The position will be located in Los Angeles, CA.

additionalPlain:
Commitment to Inclusion

At Tinder, we don’t just accept difference, we celebrate it. We strive to build a workplace that reflects the rich diversity of our members around the world, and we value unique perspectives and backgrounds. Even if you don’t meet all the listed qualifications, we invite you to apply and show us how your skills could transfer. Tinder is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace where we welcome people of all sexes, gender identities, races, ethnicities, disabilities, and other lived experiences. Learn more here: https://www.lifeattinder.com/dei

If you require reasonable accommodation to complete a job application, pre-employment testing, or a job interview or to otherwise participate in the hiring process, please contact employeebenefits@matchgroup.com.

descriptionPlain:
Our Mission

As humans, there are few things more exciting than meeting someone new. At Tinder, we’re inspired by the challenge of keeping the magic of human connection alive. With tens of millions of users, hundreds of millions of downloads, 2+ billion swipes per day, 20+ million matches per day, and a presence in 190+ countries, our reach is expansive—and rapidly growing.
 
We work together to solve complex problems. Behind the simplicity of every match, we think deeply about human relationships, behavioral science, network economics, AI and ML, online and real-world safety, cultural nuances, loneliness, love, sex, and more.

The Emerging cross-functional team will work on Tinder’s cutting edge of ideas and features, keeping up to date with the most relevant social and technological trends and developing a perspective on how Tinder can use them for the future of dating. We’re looking for a strong, senior individual with deep experience in inbound Product Marketing to join the team– partnering closely with Product to ideate, position, test, and validate innovative, pioneering product ideas. This person will have a deep understanding of user needs for our existing and future audience, as well as a strong perspective on what it takes for a product to have strong marketability that can drive word-of-mouth.

This is a perfect role for a hands-on, data-driven, consumer tech marketer that has an intuitive understanding of how to balance brand, business, and UX needs to get results. You are eager to learn and explore, comfortable creating clarity from ambiguity, and asking “what if?” You can develop new processes and ways of working cross-functionally with Marketing, Product, Design, Comms, and Insights to help us scale growth and elevate our in-app brand experience. This role is best suited for someone highly flexible and agile, who is willing to navigate rapid product and marketing testing. This highly cross-functional role will report into the Senior Director of Global Product Marketing based in NY.

This is a hybrid role and requires in-office collaboration three days per week. This position is located in Los Angeles, Palo Alto or San Francisco.

lists.content:
• Partner with Product and Design to develop product strategy and test plans, including brainstorming concepts, advocating for the voice of the user, prototyping, and iterating on product ideas to improve their potential
  • Lead naming, positioning, and messaging that will resonate with users and differentiate our Tinder in the market
  • Collaborate across Marketing and Engagement teams to develop, test and implement marketing strategies that drive product awareness and adoption
  • Position and package our products with a Tinder brand lens to ensure they are relevant, differentiated and special. Build a consistent and compelling narrative across channels and product lines, maintaining strong messaging hierarchy and effective content strategy plans
  • Develop user journey maps and messaging that addresses user needs, struggles, and objections, as well as encourages them to take action.
  • Partner with Product, Insights, and Analytics on creating new ways of rapid testing and validating new feature ideas. Prioritize features in terms of importance to the user.
  • Draw on qualitative and quantitative insights to understand product adoption, usage, and retention across customer segments
  • Advise on competitive analyses and consumer research efforts to understand key user segments and define opportunities
  • Support regional marketing teams by advocating for their product needs and requests
  • Own internal communication of product marketing initiatives

• 5-8+ years of experience working in Product Marketing, leading full-funnel go-to-market strategies, preferably in consumer tech and mobile apps
  • Experience working on brands with Global impact, and driving multi-regional marketing strategies
  • Experience launching new products and/or categories from 0 to 1, collaborating deeply with Product, Engineering, Design, and Research
  • Proven ability to deliver well-branded, fabulous user experiences and marketing strategies that drive business growth
  • Passion for the user, able to advocate for user needs
  • Excellent leadership, influencing and communication skills, with an ability to express high-level concepts efficiently and optimally to a wide range of audiences
  • Highly collaborative and creative. Capable of leading cross-functional teams (especially Product, Marketing, and Creative teams) to produce innovative solutions
  • Fluency with key business and marketing analytics
  • Strong project management abilities to plan and implement complex cross-functional initiatives

• You’re a futurist, able to spot trends and predict new opportunities before others
  • Experience working on brands within a company’s portfolio

lists.text: As a full-time employee, you’ll enjoy:
lists.content:
• Unlimited PTO (with no waiting period), 10 annual Wellness Days
  • Time off to volunteer and charitable donations matching
  • Comprehensive health, vision, and dental coverage
  • 100% 401(k) employer match up to 10%, Employee Stock Purchase Plan (ESPP)
  • 100% paid parental leave (including for non-birthing parents), family forming benefits, and Milk Stork, which provides access to breast milk shipping for business travel, surrogacy, and employee relocation
  • Investment in your development: mentorship through our MentorMatch program, access to 6,000+ online courses through Udemy, and an annual stipend for your professional development
  • Investment in your wellness: access to mental health support via Modern Health, and Insight Timer; paid concierge medical membership, pet insurance, fitness membership subsidy, and commuter subsidy
  • Free subscription to Tinder Gold

salaryDescription: Factors such as scope and responsibilities of the position, candidate's work experience, education/training, job-related skills, internal peer equity, as well as market and business considerations may influence base pay offered. This salary range is reflective of a position based in Los Angeles. This salary will be subject to a geographic adjustment (according to a specific city and state), if an authorization is granted to work outside of the location listed in this posting.

additionalPlain:
雇用形態
・正社員（試用期間:3ヶ月）

給与
・基本給＋45時間分みなし残業代＋賞与／経験・能力を考慮の上、当社規定により決定いたします
・昇給：上長との定期面談があり、年に1回昇給を決定いたします
・賞与：業績貢献度に応じて年に1回支給いたします

勤務時間
・フレックスタイム制、ハイブリッドリモート

休日・休暇
年間休日：130日（2022年実績）
・完全週休2日制/土日祝休み
・夏季、冬季休暇
・有給休暇
・特別休暇（誕生日休暇、アニバーサリー休暇など）
・産前産後/育児休暇、生理休暇 etc.

descriptionPlain:
エウレカにおけるProduct Marketing Manager（以下PMM）は、Productの持つ可能性を最大限に引き出し、ユーザーの成功を促進することに責任を持つポジションです。PMMはターゲットとなる顧客が持つ、顕在化した、もしくは潜在的な課題を深く理解し、Pairsがその課題をいかに効果的に解決するかをクリアなメッセージで伝えることによって各Productの認知・使用を最大化し、その結果としてユーザーがPairsから得られるValueを最大化します。PMMは、Product ManagerおよびDesigner, Marketing Team等ステークホルダーとの緊密なコラボレーションによって、Product Marketing活動の計画から実行、振り返りから改善までの全体サイクルをリードします。

【求められるミッション】
新規ローンチProductのImpactを最大化する
Pairsユーザーの成功体験を最大化する

【業務内容】
新規ProductのGo To Market（GTM）戦略の立案
各ProductのNarrative, Communication Designの作成
各StakeholderとのクロスファンクショナルなProject management
GTM施策の振り返りと改善施策の立案
ユーザー数のモニタリングとボトルネックの特定
アクションプランの立案と優先順位付け
Product Marketing用コンテンツの企画・開発
キャンペーン施策の立案および予算管理
開発以外のFunctionへのProductに関する情報共有・啓蒙

lists.content:
• 最低3年のProduct Marketingもしくは類似する領域での経験
  • Productの利用率を改善した実績とそれに伴うデータ分析スキル
  • 優れたプロジェクトマネジメントスキル
  • 書面および口頭での優れたコミュニケーションスキル
  • ビジネスレベル以上の日本語力

• 新規ProductのGTMをLeadした実績
  • Productの利用率を改善した実績
  • 多変量解析などの高度なデータ分析スキル
  • ODSマーケットの経験および深い理解
  • プロモーション施策における優れた実績
  • HTML, CSS, JavascriptなどWebフロントエンドに関する理解
  • Product開発、CS、AIなどに関する専門的な知識

descriptionPlain:
The role of a Senior Brand Manager for Tinder India is a multifaceted position that involves a comprehensive understanding of brand strategy, narrative development, and execution across various channels.

This role demands a strategic, creative, and collaborative leader who can drive the brand's success across various channels while maintaining a consistent and engaging brand experience for users.

Narrative, Strategy, Positioning, and Customer Custodian:
- Develop and maintain a compelling brand narrative that resonates with the target audience.
- Craft and implement a comprehensive brand strategy, ensuring alignment with Tinder’s Tone of Voice (TOV) and overarching brand goals.
- Serve as the custodian of the customer experience, consistently delivering a brand message and how it comes alive across category moments, across channels that fosters connection and engagement.

Strategic Brand Assets and Content Marketing:
- Conceptualize, plan, and execute strategic brand assets, content marketing opportunities and product marketing programs.
- Ensure that all content aligns seamlessly with the brand's voice and resonates with the target audience.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate brand assets into broader marketing initiatives.

Cross-Functional Collaboration:
- Partner closely with product marketing, performance media, regional initiatives, influencer activations, brand partnerships, communications, and offline events teams.
- Maintain consistency in brand messaging and voice across various touchpoints and initiatives.
- Foster collaborative relationships to ensure a unified brand experience for users.

Project Management:
- Own or support project management, including budget management, calendar and timeline management, contracts, and measurement for success.
- Lead initiatives from conceptualization to execution, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to budgets.

Consumer Touchpoint Channels:
- Lead and oversee all consumer touchpoint channels, with a particular focus on social media and YouTube.
- Develop and implement engaging campaigns that drive brand awareness and user engagement.

Market Analysis and Competitor Research:
- Identify white spaces in the category and stay abreast of competitor strategies and market trends.
- Use data and insights to inform strategic decisions and differentiate the brand in a competitive landscape.

Measurement of Impact and Success:
- Support the measurement of the impact and success of brand activations and campaigns.
- Deliver comprehensive recaps, track against KPIs, and provide insights for continuous improvement.

Brand Governance:
- Ensure brand governance across all brand-led activities, guiding other teams to align with brand values and goals.
- Uphold brand consistency and integrity in all communications and initiatives.

Agency Partnership:
- Serve as the Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for all creative and social agency partners.
- Foster collaborative and productive relationships with agency partners to achieve brand objectives.

- Serve as the Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for all creative and social agency partners.
- Foster collaborative and productive relationships with agency partners to achieve brand objectives.

lists.content:
• 6+ years in brand/marketing, with experience in culture marketing and content strategy experience preferred
  • Ability to demonstrate agility, speed and align with Tinder’s core values 
  • Experience managing high-profile initiatives, working with internal and external teams to ensure programs are launched to the highest impact
  • Deep understanding of how to set and track KPIs to measure brand success
  • Willingness to roll up your sleeves and get deep into the work as part of a lean team on a high impact brand 
  • Proven experience influencing and communicating with cross-functional teams & building collaborative partnerships and interfacing with high-profile stakeholders
  • Display high level of ownership of projects and assigned verticals 
  • Have a passion for culture driving brands and a deep understanding of Internet moments and when to lean in versus out

descriptionBody:
The role of a Senior Brand Manager for Tinder India is a multifaceted position that involves a comprehensive understanding of brand strategy, narrative development, and execution across various channels.

This role demands a strategic, creative, and collaborative leader who can drive the brand's success across various channels while maintaining a consistent and engaging brand experience for users.

Narrative, Strategy, Positioning, and Customer Custodian:
- Develop and maintain a compelling brand narrative that resonates with the target audience.
- Craft and implement a comprehensive brand strategy, ensuring alignment with Tinder’s Tone of Voice (TOV) and overarching brand goals.
- Serve as the custodian of the customer experience, consistently delivering a brand message and how it comes alive across category moments, across channels that fosters connection and engagement.

Strategic Brand Assets and Content Marketing:
- Conceptualize, plan, and execute strategic brand assets, content marketing opportunities and product marketing programs.
- Ensure that all content aligns seamlessly with the brand's voice and resonates with the target audience.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate brand assets into broader marketing initiatives.

Cross-Functional Collaboration:
- Partner closely with product marketing, performance media, regional initiatives, influencer activations, brand partnerships, communications, and offline events teams.
- Maintain consistency in brand messaging and voice across various touchpoints and initiatives.
- Foster collaborative relationships to ensure a unified brand experience for users.

Project Management:
- Own or support project management, including budget management, calendar and timeline management, contracts, and measurement for success.
- Lead initiatives from conceptualization to execution, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to budgets.

Consumer Touchpoint Channels:
- Lead and oversee all consumer touchpoint channels, with a particular focus on social media and YouTube.
- Develop and implement engaging campaigns that drive brand awareness and user engagement.

Market Analysis and Competitor Research:
- Identify white spaces in the category and stay abreast of competitor strategies and market trends.
- Use data and insights to inform strategic decisions and differentiate the brand in a competitive landscape.

Measurement of Impact and Success:
- Support the measurement of the impact and success of brand activations and campaigns.
- Deliver comprehensive recaps, track against KPIs, and provide insights for continuous improvement.

Brand Governance:
- Ensure brand governance across all brand-led activities, guiding other teams to align with brand values and goals.
- Uphold brand consistency and integrity in all communications and initiatives.

Agency Partnership:
- Serve as the Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for all creative and social agency partners.
- Foster collaborative and productive relationships with agency partners to achieve brand objectives.

#LI-DNI


Why Match Group?

Our mission is simple – to help people find love and happiness! We love our employees too and understand the importance of all life's milestones.  Here are some of the benefits we are proud to offer: 

Mind & Body – Medical, mental health, and wellness benefits to support your overall health and well-being
Financial Wellness – Competitive compensation, 100% employer match on 401k contributions up to 10% (cap at $10,000), as well as an employee stock purchase program to help you feel supported in your financial security
Unplug – Generous PTO and 18 paid holidays so you can unplug
Career – Annual training allowance for professional development and ERG membership opportunities and events so you feel connected and empowered in your work
Family – Families come in all shapes and sizes so we offer 20 weeks of 100% paid parental leave, fertility, adoption, and child care resources, as well as pet insurance and discounts  
Company Gatherings – We host fun happy hours and company events where our employees get to know each other 	and build a sense of connection and belonging!

We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer and we value the rich dynamics that diversity brings to our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, creed, national origin, ancestry, disability, marital status, age, sexual orientation, sex (including pregnancy and sexual harassment), gender identity or expression, uniformed service or veteran status, genetic information, or any other legally protected characteristic.  Period. 

If you require reasonable accommodation to complete a job application, pre-employment testing, or a job interview or to otherwise participate in the hiring process, please contact employeebenefits@matchgroup.com.

descriptionPlain:
Act as the key internal point-of-contact for an assigned portfolio of brands and subject matter expert on privacy law, including providing practical, timely, strategic, and high-quality legal advice on data privacy matters. Lead contractual negotiations with vendors and other partners on data protection terms. Lead the privacy review of new features and services to strategically advise on emerging products and technologies while anticipating and successfully navigating privacy considerations. Lead in the development of privacy policies and procedures as part of the ongoing evolution of Match’s privacy strategy. Use strong communication skills (written and verbal) to lead internal training on legal and regulatory requirements relating to privacy, as well as best practices. Ensure timely reporting to the Data Protection Officer on new projects related to the processing of personal data. Identify and advise on key
legal issues requiring attention from the privacy team and anticipate potential privacy legal issues within the organization. Participate in the development of Match’s privacy strategy to meet changing global privacy requirements. Review new privacy laws to ensure compliance on current and future projects. Provide legal counsel on investigations involving reports of inappropriate or unauthorized access, loss or disclosure of personal data, including advising on potential liability, identifying legal obligations, and supporting incident response efforts. Telecommuting may be permitted. When not telecommuting, must report to 8800 Sunset Blvd., West Hollywood, CA 90069. Salary: $194,438 - $210,000 per year.
 
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS: J.D., L.L.M., or U.S. equivalent in law, plus 5 years of professional experience as attorney, counsel, or any occupation/position/job title involving practice of law. Must be admitted to practice law in one of the following US jurisdictions: California, New York or Texas.
 
Must also have experience in the following: 5 years of professional experience as a practicing attorney (in-house or at a law firm) providing legal counseling on data privacy matters; 5 years of professional experience working with relevant privacy statutes, regulations and guidance, including those in the U.S., Europe, and Canada; 3 years of professional experience assessing legal risks relating to data protection and privacy, and identifying and advising on practical, compliant ways to mitigate those risks; 2 years of professional experience responding to regulatory complaints and investigations; 2 years of professional experience with new and emerging technologies, including AI/ML and biometrics; 2 years of professional experience with data incident response.
 
CONTACT: Please send resume to: Lauren.Lozano@Match.com. Please specify ad code AELL.

additionalPlain:
雇用形態
・正社員（試用期間:3ヶ月）

給与
・基本給＋45時間分みなし残業代＋賞与／経験・能力を考慮の上、当社規定により決定いたします
・昇給：上長との定期面談があり、年に1回昇給を決定いたします
・賞与：業績貢献度に応じて年に1回支給いたします

勤務時間
・フレックスタイム制、ハイブリッドリモート

休日・休暇
年間休日：130日（2022年実績）
・完全週休2日制/土日祝休み
・夏季、冬季休暇
・有給休暇
・特別休暇（誕生日休暇、アニバーサリー休暇など）
・産前産後/育児休暇、生理休暇 etc.

descriptionPlain:
国内最大級のオンラインデーティングサービス「Pairs」のグロースを支えるデータ利活用の推進をお任せします。株式会社エウレカでは、現在、累計会員数2,000万人を突破した恋活・婚活マッチングサービス「Pairs」を展開しています。これらのブランドの提供・拡大を通じてデーティングや婚活領域などのライフステージ領域でのリーダーシップを高めて、ミッションである “人生に「あってよかった」と思ってもらえるものを” の実現を目指しています。
エウレカでは様々な意思決定の場でデータを重視する風土です。データ利活用の領域を広げ、分析のスピード・質を向上させることがPairsのこれからのグロースに不可欠です。
 そこで、本ポジションは業界トップクラスのオンライン広告予算を運用しているマーケティングチームと連携し、獲得評価モデルの強化や意思決定のロジック構築、マーケティング領域におけるサイエンスを通してPairsの成長に貢献いただきます。
前提にとらわれず、エウレカの価値のある意思決定と意思決定の効率化を推進する人をお待ちしています。


【実際の業務内容】
ユーザ獲得戦略の策定・広告運用を行うマーケティング・ファイナンスチームと密に連携し、Pairsのグロース推進をしていただきます：

・データ分析に基づいて、マーケティング施策の効果最大化をリード
・マーケティング施策のプランニング/評価方法の標準化
・マーケティング・ファイナンス・プロダクト・リサーチチームと連携し、事業戦略を策定・評価
・各組織でのデータ利活用の推進


【仕事から得られるもの】
・国内最大級のオンラインデーティングサービスのプロダクト開発経験（「恋愛」をテーマにした貴重で難しい膨大なデータを取り扱います）
・データで事業成果に直接貢献する仕組みづくりの経験
・マーケティング・ファイナンス・プロダクト・リサーチチームとの連携を通した、定量定性情報を活かした戦略策定経験
・ビジネス・統計・データ基盤・機械学習など様々な専門性を持つメンバーと働く経験
・外資系IT企業ならではの論理性、圧倒的スピードのあるプロダクト開発経験
・英語力（業務上必須ではありませんが、親会社や外国籍メンバーとのコミュニケーションのため英会話学習をサポート。また、社内メンバーの国籍は、中国・台湾・韓国・オーストラリア・アメリカ・フランスと多種多様です）
・プロダクト開発を通した社会貢献（晩婚化問題、少子化問題、人生における自由な選択 etc.）


【使っているツール/環境】
・プロジェクト管理ツール：JIRA / Monday
・ナレッジマネジメントツール：Confluence / whimsical
・コミュニケーションツール：Slack
・BIツール: Tableau, Looker Studio
・データ基盤開発言語: Python
・データベース: Google BigQuery / Amazon Aurora / Amazon DynamoDB / Elasticsearch
・データストレージ: Google Cloud Storage / Amazon S3
・データ収集・ETL基盤: dbt / Dagster / Fivetran/ Google Cloud Dataflow

• SQL言語によるデータ抽出・分析の経験（実務経験5年以上）
  • redash / TableauなどのBIツールでダッシュボード実装の経験（実務経験2年以上）
  • パフォーマンスマーケティング施策の分析経験（実務経験1年以上）
  • 統計検定2級程度の統計知識
  • データ分析でアクションを自ら提案し、サービスの改善をした経験
  • 組織横断のプロジェクトをリードした経験
  • 日本語ビジネスレベル以上

• toCサービス事業での分析経験
  • MarketingMixModel/計量経済学/AB Testへの知識
  • データサイエンス/統計学の専門知識
  • データ分析プロセスを改善した経験
  • 複雑で抽象度が高い分析課題も定式化・定量化して解決できるスキル
  • ディレクター・エグゼクティブメンバーとの業務経験
  • ビジネスレベルの英語能力

• オンラインデーティング業界の未来に共感しコミットできる
  • 部署横断で周囲を巻き込み、引っ張るコミュニケーションができる
  • チームやプロダクトのあるべき姿を考え続けられる
  • 前提から疑い自らで道を切り開ける
  • 必要に応じて役割にとらわれずに、意見や意思決定ができる
  • 勉強し続ける、やりきれる（難しい局面で粘れる）
  • リスクやサービスの思想、市場含めたバランスの広い観点で思考ができる

descriptionBody:
国内最大級のオンラインデーティングサービス「Pairs」のグロースを支えるデータ利活用の推進をお任せします。株式会社エウレカでは、現在、累計会員数2,000万人を突破した恋活・婚活マッチングサービス「Pairs」を展開しています。これらのブランドの提供・拡大を通じてデーティングや婚活領域などのライフステージ領域でのリーダーシップを高めて、ミッションである “人生に「あってよかった」と思ってもらえるものを” の実現を目指しています。
エウレカでは様々な意思決定の場でデータを重視する風土です。データ利活用の領域を広げ、分析のスピード・質を向上させることがPairsのこれからのグロースに不可欠です。
 そこで、本ポジションは業界トップクラスのオンライン広告予算を運用しているマーケティングチームと連携し、獲得評価モデルの強化や意思決定のロジック構築、マーケティング領域におけるサイエンスを通してPairsの成長に貢献いただきます。
前提にとらわれず、エウレカの価値のある意思決定と意思決定の効率化を推進する人をお待ちしています。


【実際の業務内容】
ユーザ獲得戦略の策定・広告運用を行うマーケティング・ファイナンスチームと密に連携し、Pairsのグロース推進をしていただきます：

・データ分析に基づいて、マーケティング施策の効果最大化をリード
・マーケティング施策のプランニング/評価方法の標準化
・マーケティング・ファイナンス・プロダクト・リサーチチームと連携し、事業戦略を策定・評価
・各組織でのデータ利活用の推進


【仕事から得られるもの】
・国内最大級のオンラインデーティングサービスのプロダクト開発経験（「恋愛」をテーマにした貴重で難しい膨大なデータを取り扱います）
・データで事業成果に直接貢献する仕組みづくりの経験
・マーケティング・ファイナンス・プロダクト・リサーチチームとの連携を通した、定量定性情報を活かした戦略策定経験
・ビジネス・統計・データ基盤・機械学習など様々な専門性を持つメンバーと働く経験
・外資系IT企業ならではの論理性、圧倒的スピードのあるプロダクト開発経験
・英語力（業務上必須ではありませんが、親会社や外国籍メンバーとのコミュニケーションのため英会話学習をサポート。また、社内メンバーの国籍は、中国・台湾・韓国・オーストラリア・アメリカ・フランスと多種多様です）
・プロダクト開発を通した社会貢献（晩婚化問題、少子化問題、人生における自由な選択 etc.）


【使っているツール/環境】
・プロジェクト管理ツール：JIRA / Monday
・ナレッジマネジメントツール：Confluence / whimsical
・コミュニケーションツール：Slack
・BIツール: Tableau, Looker Studio
・データ基盤開発言語: Python
・データベース: Google BigQuery / Amazon Aurora / Amazon DynamoDB / Elasticsearch
・データストレージ: Google Cloud Storage / Amazon S3
・データ収集・ETL基盤: dbt / Dagster / Fivetran/ Google Cloud Dataflow

As a member of our team, you’ll enjoy:

401(k) Matching: We match 100% of the first 10% of pre-tax 401(k) contributions you make, up to a maximum of $10,000 per year.

Professional Growth: Get a $3,000 annual Learning & Development stipend once you’ve been with us for three months. You also get free access to Udemy, an online learning and teaching marketplace with over 6000 courses, starting your first day.

Parental Leave & Planning: When you become a new parent, you’re eligible for 100% paid parental leave (20 paid weeks for both birth and non-birth parents.)

Fertility Support: You’ll get easy access to fertility care through Carrot, from basic treatments to fertility preservation. We also provide $10,000 toward fertility preservation. You and your spouse/domestic partner are both eligible.

Date Stipend: All Hinge employees receive a $100 monthly stipend for epic dates– Romantic or otherwise. Hinge Premium is also free for employees and their loved ones.

ERGs: We have eight Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)—Asian, Unapologetic, Disability, LGBTQIA+, Vibras, Women/Nonbinary, Parents, and Remote—that hold regular meetings, host events, and provide dedicated support to the organization & its community.

descriptionPlain:
Hinge is the dating app designed to be deleted

In today's digital world, finding genuine relationships is tougher than ever. At Hinge, we’re on a mission to inspire intimate connection to create a less lonely world. We’re obsessed with understanding our users’ behaviors to help them find love, and our success is defined by one simple metric– setting up great dates. With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

About the Role: 

Hinge is seeking an experienced leader with a deep passion for coaching and growing others to lead the Data Science and Analytics team that supports our Growth Product Group. This role will report to the Director of Data Science and Analytics and will be an integral part of Hinge’s Data Leadership team.

In this role you will be responsible for leading a high performing team of Data Scientists and Data Analysts that provides insights to enable data driven decision making throughout the Product Development process. You will partner closely with leads across Product Management, User Research, Design, Engineering, Strategy, Finance, Marketing, and Trust & Safety to help establish and drive forward our roadmap and strategy for the Growth Product Group.

About the Role:

Hinge is seeking an experienced leader with a deep passion for coaching and growing others to lead the Data Science and Analytics team that supports our Growth Product Group. This role will report to the Director of Data Science and Analytics and will be an integral part of Hinge’s Data Leadership team.

In this role you will be responsible for leading a high performing team of Data Scientists and Data Analysts that provides insights to enable data driven decision making throughout the Product Development process. You will partner closely with leads across Product Management, User Research, Design, Engineering, Strategy, Finance, Marketing, and Trust & Safety to help establish and drive forward our roadmap and strategy for the Growth Product Group.

lists.content:
• Manage an organization of Data Scientists and Data Analysts
  • Empower your team to execute on the reporting, analytics, and experimentation needs of Product and other teams at Hinge
  • Continuously identify new opportunities to apply different data & analytical methodologies to support Product Development
  • Partner with Product Leadership to establish best practices, processes, and principles for Product Development
  • Evolve the mission, technical direction, and culture of the Growth Data Science and Analytics team
  • Collaborate with other Data Science and Analytics leaders to establish long term (two years) vision for the Data Science and Analytics team and translate that into quarterly objectives
  • Develop annual roadmaps for Data Science and Analytics projects and hiring, and translate those into quarterly plans
  • Coach, grow and empower team members
  • Collaborate with Machine Learning & Algorithms, Business Intelligence, and Data Engineering teams on high impact Data projects
  • Perform other job-related duties as assigned

• 5+ years of experience as a data scientist, including 2+ years as a manager
  • Deep technical expertise and experience in Product Analytics (A/B Testing) with strong understanding of and exposure to Machine Learning
  • Extensive experience collaborating cross-functionally with Product, Engineering, and other disciplines at both the leadership and hands-on levels
  • Passion for developing and coaching direct reports
  • Full commitment to team members’ well-being
  • Experience building and delivering on long term plans, strategy, projects, and hiring plans
  • Proficiency in SQL and python
  • Superb communication skills, particularly the ability to listen, synthesize, advocate, and evangelize

salaryDescription: Factors such as scope and responsibilities of the position, candidate's work experience, education/training, job-related skills, internal peer equity, as well as market and business considerations may influence base pay offered. This salary range is reflective of a position based in New York City. This salary will be subject to a geographic adjustment (according to a specific city and state), if an authorization is granted to work outside of the location listed in this posting.

descriptionPlain:
Hinge is the dating app designed to be deleted

In today's digital world, finding genuine relationships is tougher than ever. At Hinge, we’re on a mission to inspire intimate connection to create a less lonely world. We’re obsessed with understanding our users’ behaviors to help them find love, and our success is defined by one simple metric– setting up great dates. With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

About the Role: 

The Dating Outcomes group is responsible for making sure people get to see their most compatible matches as well as helping them better present themselves or even start a conversation when they match with someone. In short we help people go on dates!

We are hiring senior/staff ML practitioners to help us build the foundations of an AI first dating experience using the latest advancements in the field leveraging Hinge’s years worth of preference data. You can expect to work on recommendation systems end to end, experiment with using LLMs, photo and mixed input embedding models as well as building and deploying real time predictive models that directly impact millions of users' experience. This is a fast-growing team and you will get a chance to own and define the strategy, vision, and plan for how to accelerate machine learning at Hinge.

We are hiring senior/staff ML practitioners to help us build the foundations of an AI first dating experience using the latest advancements in the field leveraging Hinge’s years worth of preference data. You can expect to work on recommendation systems end to end, experiment with using LLMs, photo and mixed input embedding models as well as building and deploying real time predictive models that directly impact millions of users' experience. This is a fast-growing team and you will get a chance to own and define the strategy, vision, and plan for how to accelerate machine learning at Hinge.

lists.content:
• Own and contribute to foundational models (e.g. CLIP embeddings) that powers our recommendations pipelines.
  • Contribute to the research and development of recommender models as well experiment with the latest ML innovations (e.g. LLM agents and transcription models)
  • Design, advocate, and implement for availability, scalability, operational excellence, and cost management while delivering impact to our daters incrementally.
  • Collaborate closely with ML Engineers, Data Scientists, and Product Managers to understand their needs and identify opportunities to accelerate the AI/ML development and deployment process.
  • Mentor and educate ML Engineers on current and up and coming research, technologies and best practices of doing ML at scale.
  • Perform other job-related duties as assigned.

• Strong programming skills: Proficiency in languages like Python, Java or C++
  • System design & architecture: Proven track record of training and deploying large scale ML models specially DNNs. Good understanding of distributed computing for learning and inference.
  • Cloud platform proficiency: The ability to utilize cloud environments such as GCP, AWS, or Azure. Familiarity with ML serving solutions like Ray, KubeFlow or W&B is a plus.
  • ML knowledge: Deep understanding of DNN architectures, track record of building, debugging and fine tuning models. Familiarity with PyTorch, TF, knowledge distillation, recommender systems are a plus.
  • Dev-ops skills: The ability to establish, manage, and use data and compute infrastructure such as Kubenetes and Terraform.
  • Data engineering knowledge: Skills in handling and managing large datasets including, data cleaning, preprocessing, and storage. Deep understanding of batch and streaming pipelines as well as orchestrators like Argo and Airflow.
  • Collaboration and communication skills: The ability to work effectively in a team and communicate complex ideas clearly with individuals from diverse technical and non-technical backgrounds..
  • Strong written communication: The ability to communicate complex ideas and technical knowledge through documentation
  • Software leadership skills: A track record of leading projects through completion with quantifiable and measurable outcomes.
  • 4+ years of experience, depending on education, as an MLE.
  • 2+ years of experience working on a cloud environment such as GCP, AWS, Azure, and with dev-ops tooling such as Kubernetes
  • 1+ year of experience leading projects with at least 1 other team member through completion.
  • 2+ years of experience for Senior designing and developing online and production grade ML systems.
  • A degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field.

opening:
Hinge is the dating app designed to be deleted

In today's digital world, finding genuine relationships is tougher than ever. At Hinge, we’re on a mission to inspire intimate connection to create a less lonely world. We’re obsessed with understanding our users’ behaviors to help them find love, and our success is defined by one simple metric– setting up great dates. With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.
descriptionBody:
About the Role:

The Dating Outcomes group is responsible for making sure people get to see their most compatible matches as well as helping them better present themselves or even start a conversation when they match with someone. In short we help people go on dates!

We are hiring senior/staff ML practitioners to help us build the foundations of an AI first dating experience using the latest advancements in the field leveraging Hinge’s years worth of preference data. You can expect to work on recommendation systems end to end, experiment with using LLMs, photo and mixed input embedding models as well as building and deploying real time predictive models that directly impact millions of users' experience. This is a fast-growing team and you will get a chance to own and define the strategy, vision, and plan for how to accelerate machine learning at Hinge.
descriptionBodyPlain:
About the Role: 

The Dating Outcomes group is responsible for making sure people get to see their most compatible matches as well as helping them better present themselves or even start a conversation when they match with someone. In short we help people go on dates!

We are hiring senior/staff ML practitioners to help us build the foundations of an AI first dating experience using the latest advancements in the field leveraging Hinge’s years worth of preference data. You can expect to work on recommendation systems end to end, experiment with using LLMs, photo and mixed input embedding models as well as building and deploying real time predictive models that directly impact millions of users' experience. This is a fast-growing team and you will get a chance to own and define the strategy, vision, and plan for how to accelerate machine learning at Hinge.

additionalPlain:
As a member of our team, you’ll enjoy:

401(k) Matching: We match 100% of the first 10% of pre-tax 401(k) contributions you make, up to a maximum of $10,000 per year.

Professional Growth: Get a $3,000 annual Learning & Development stipend once you’ve been with us for three months. You also get free access to Udemy, an online learning and teaching marketplace with over 6000 courses, starting your first day.

Parental Leave & Planning: When you become a new parent, you’re eligible for 100% paid parental leave (20 paid weeks for both birth and non-birth parents.)

Fertility Support: You’ll get easy access to fertility care through Carrot, from basic treatments to fertility preservation. We also provide $10,000 toward fertility preservation. You and your spouse/domestic partner are both eligible.

Date Stipend: All Hinge employees receive a $100 monthly stipend for epic dates– Romantic or otherwise. Hinge Premium is also free for employees and their loved ones.

ERGs: We have eight Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)—Asian, Unapologetic, Disability, LGBTQIA+, Vibras, Women/Nonbinary, Parents, and Remote—that hold regular meetings, host events, and provide dedicated support to the organization & its community.

At Hinge, our core values are…

Authenticity: We share, never hide, our words, actions and intentions.

Courage: We embrace lofty goals and tough challenges.

Empathy: We deeply consider the perspective of others.

Diversity inspires innovation

Hinge is an equal-opportunity employer. We value diversity at our company and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We believe success is created by a diverse workforce of individuals with different ideas, strengths, interests, and cultural backgrounds.

If you require reasonable accommodation to complete a job application, pre-employment testing, or a job interview or to otherwise participate in the hiring process, please contact employeebenefits@matchgroup.com.

descriptionPlain:
Hinge is the dating app designed to be deleted

In today's digital world, finding genuine relationships is tougher than ever. At Hinge, we’re on a mission to inspire intimate connection to create a less lonely world. We’re obsessed with understanding our users’ behaviors to help them find love, and our success is defined by one simple metric– setting up great dates. With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

About the Role: 

The Growth Product Group is responsible for making Hinge the dating destination for all communities, driving engagement throughout a user’s lifecycle, and the development of paid features to accelerate dating outcomes.  We are hiring a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to support our User Growth and Monetization teams in building the foundations of an AI-first experience using the latest advances in causal inference and machine learning.  You can expect to work on a broad range of user problems, from identifying how to send the right message to the right user at the right time to optimizing the efficacy of our paid offerings.  This is a fast growing team, and you will help define the vision and roadmap for improving the dater experience.

In today's digital world, finding genuine relationships is tougher than ever. At Hinge, we’re on a mission to inspire intimate connection to create a less lonely world. We’re obsessed with understanding our users’ behaviors to help them find love, and our success is defined by one simple metric– setting up great dates. With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

About the Role:

The Growth Product Group is responsible for making Hinge the dating destination for all communities, driving engagement throughout a user’s lifecycle, and the development of paid features to accelerate dating outcomes.  We are hiring a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to support our User Growth and Monetization teams in building the foundations of an AI-first experience using the latest advances in causal inference and machine learning.  You can expect to work on a broad range of user problems, from identifying how to send the right message to the right user at the right time to optimizing the efficacy of our paid offerings.  This is a fast growing team, and you will help define the vision and roadmap for improving the dater experience.

lists.content:
• Develop and deploy targeting and timing models that underlie a smart notifications system that guides and influences user behavior to improve dating outcomes.
  • Improve user engagement with notifications by optimizing for relevancy and personalizing for responsiveness.
  • Design, advocate, and implement for availability, scalability, operational excellence, and cost management while delivering impact to our daters.
  • Keep abreast of and bring to Hinge applicable cutting-edge research, technologies, and best practices in the ML/AI space.
  • Ensure the ethical and responsible use of ML/AI and compliance with privacy regulations to protect user data.
  • Communicate effectively to audiences of various technical and non-technical backgrounds.
  • Perform other job-related duties as assigned.

• Proficiency in languages like Python, Java, or C++
  • Domain expertise: Deep understanding of machine learning deep learning, and emerging AI technologies. Proven track record of building, debugging, and fine-tuning machine learning for user facing products.
  • System design & architecture: Experience training and deploying large scale ML models especially DNNs. Good understanding of distributed computing for learning and inference.
  • Cloud platform proficiency: The ability to utilize cloud environments such as GCP, AWS, or Azure. Familiarity with Ray, KubeFlow, or Weights & Biases is a plus.
  • Data engineering knowledge: Skills in handling and managing large datasets including data cleaning, preprocessing, and storage. Deep understanding of batch and streaming pipelines as well as orchestrators like Argo and Airflow.
  • Collaboration and communication skills: The ability to work effectively in a team and communicate complex ideas clearly with individuals from diverse technical and non-technical backgrounds..
  • Strong written communication: The ability to communicate complex ideas and technical knowledge through documentation
  • Software leadership skills: A track record of leading projects through completion with quantifiable and measurable outcomes.
  • 4+ years of experience as an MLE, previous experience in User Growth or Monetization is preferred.
  • 2+ years of experience working on a cloud environment such as GCP, AWS, or Azure.
  • 2+ years of experience designing and developing online and production grade ML systems.
  • A degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field, or equivalent experience.

salaryDescription: Factors such as scope and responsibilities of the position, candidate's work experience, education/training, job-related skills, internal peer equity, as well as market and business considerations may influence base pay offered. This salary range is reflective of a position based in New York City. This salary will be subject to a geographic adjustment (according to a specific city and state), if an authorization is granted to work outside of the location listed in this posting.Strong programming skills:

descriptionPlain:
Hinge is the dating app designed to be deleted

In today's digital world, finding genuine relationships is tougher than ever. At Hinge, we’re on a mission to inspire intimate connection to create a less lonely world. We’re obsessed with understanding our users’ behaviors to help them find love, and our success is defined by one simple metric– setting up great dates. With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

About the Role: 

Join Hinge as a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, where you'll lead the application of AI to effectively mitigate the impact of bad actors and ensure user safety on the platform. Working closely with an expanding Trust & Safety team, you will collaborate with product managers, data scientists, engineers, and analysts to develop impactful AI solutions. In this high-impact role within a small, dynamic team, you'll have the opportunity to play a foundational role in shaping an AI-first Hinge, contributing to the next era of online dating. Your expertise will be instrumental in creating a safer and more meaningful user experience on their journey to find connection.
description:
Hinge is the dating app designed to be deleted

In today's digital world, finding genuine relationships is tougher than ever. At Hinge, we’re on a mission to inspire intimate connection to create a less lonely world. We’re obsessed with understanding our users’ behaviors to help them find love, and our success is defined by one simple metric– setting up great dates. With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

About the Role:

Join Hinge as a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, where you'll lead the application of AI to effectively mitigate the impact of bad actors and ensure user safety on the platform. Working closely with an expanding Trust & Safety team, you will collaborate with product managers, data scientists, engineers, and analysts to develop impactful AI solutions. In this high-impact role within a small, dynamic team, you'll have the opportunity to play a foundational role in shaping an AI-first Hinge, contributing to the next era of online dating. Your expertise will be instrumental in creating a safer and more meaningful user experience on their journey to find connection.

lists.content:
• Develop, deploy, and maintain machine learning models to identify and mitigate instances of fraudulent activities such as fake profiles, scams, and catfishing.
  • Deliver AI-enabled product features to detect and prevent inappropriate or harmful content and behavior on Hinge.
  • Building AI systems to continuously evaluate the performance of safety algorithms, ensuring they adapt to evolving threats and provide accurate results.
  • Ensure that machine learning models comply with privacy regulations and company policies, taking steps to protect user data and maintain a high level of transparency in the use of AI.
  • Explore new machine learning techniques, technologies, and industry best practices to continuously improve the effectiveness of safety measures and stay ahead of potential threats.
  • Collaborate closely with Data Scientists, Data Engineers, Product Managers, Backend Engineers, and the AI Platform Team to ensure a comprehensive and coordinated approach to user safety.
  • Communicate effectively to audiences of various technical and non-technical backgrounds
  • Perform other job-related duties as assigned.

• Strong programming skills: Proficiency in languages like Python, Java or C++ and SQL
  • System design & architecture: Proven track record of training and deploying large scale ML models specially DNNs. Good understanding of distributed computing for learning and inference.
  • Cloud platform proficiency: The ability to utilize cloud environments such as GCP, AWS, or Azure. Familiarity with ML serving solutions like Ray, KubeFlow or W&B is a plus.
  • ML knowledge: Deep understanding of DNN architectures, track record of building, debugging and fine tuning models. Familiarity with PyTorch, TF, and Keras are a plus.
  • Data engineering knowledge: Skills in handling and managing large datasets including, data cleaning, preprocessing, and storage. Deep understanding of batch and streaming pipelines as well as orchestrators like Argo and Airflow.
  • Collaboration and communication skills: The ability to work effectively in a team and communicate complex ideas clearly with individuals from diverse technical and non-technical backgrounds.
  • Strong written communication: The ability to communicate complex ideas and technical knowledge through documentation.
  • Cloud platform proficiency: The ability to utilize cloud environments such as GCP, AWS, or Azure. 
  • 4+ years of experience, depending on education, as an MLE or data scientist.
  • 2+ years of experience in applying machine learning models in an industry setting
  • 1+ years of experience developing and deploying real-time natural language processing (NLP) models.
  • 1+ years of experience working on a cloud environment such as GCP, AWS, or Azure
  • A degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field.

descriptionPlain:
Hinge is the dating app designed to be deleted

In today's digital world, finding genuine relationships is tougher than ever. At Hinge, we’re on a mission to inspire intimate connection to create a less lonely world. We’re obsessed with understanding our users’ behaviors to help them find love, and our success is defined by one simple metric– setting up great dates. With tens of millions of users across the globe, we’ve become the most trusted way to find a relationship, for all.

About the Role

Joining Hinge’s AI Platform Core team offers a unique opportunity to help define and contribute to a budding ML platform with the goal of accelerating the development, deployment, and operations of AI enabled features on Hinge. If you are excited by the idea of working on challenges ranging from establishing our initial training and serving frameworks, building millisecond real-time predictions at scale, automating the machine learning model lifecycle, implementing model monitoring, and building support for generative AI models, then read on!

With a mission to democratize AI for Hinge, ensuring it remains easily accessible, robust, scalable, cost-efficient, and trusted you'll collaborate across our product and engineering teams, as well as with external stakeholders. You will meet our internal customers where they are and optimize towards their needs by delivering value incrementally and coupled to their problems. Being part of a small yet impactful team means having a broad scope of responsibility, and as ML is still in its early stages at Hinge, this role provides a chance to grow as a leader by mentoring others across the company. This is an exciting opportunity to own and help define the future of machine learning within a rapidly growing team!
